item.title: Shadow Warrior 2
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Shadow Warrior 2 you can play online with a friend, fighting for free in various version modes or co-op. Using an online Internet connection, you can team up with up to four people to go through the plot of the project together. The possibility of free online play also includes fighting each other on random maps or completing challenges of varying degrees of difficulty. While going through the campaign, each participant takes on the role of Lo Wang, and sees his partners as other ninjas.

item.title: WARSHIFT
item.description: Game Description On the pirate WARSHIFT you can play online for free with a friend, organizing battles on a variety of maps, including planetary surfaces and outer space. item.description: Game Description Aragami is a third-person stealth action game that you can play for free online as a pirate with a friend or go on a solo adventure. item.description: Game Description Viking Squad immerses players in a thrilling Norse adventure where the fate of Valhalla hangs in the balance. item.title: Ax, Bow and Staff
item.description: Game Description Axe, Bow and Staff is a side-scroller game that you can play online online, teaming up with a friend or several other people to go through multiplayer modes for free on a pirate. item.title: Wuppo: Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description Wuppo: Definitive Edition is a co-op puzzle game that lets you join forces with a friend to escape exile for free on pirates. item.title: Cossacks 3
item.description: Game Description On pirate Cossacks 3 you can play online for free with a friend. You can play the game in co-op or compete online. item.title: Cockroach simulator
item.description: Game Description The adventure game Cockroach Simulator is a fun project that tells the story of the difficult life of a domestic pest. On the pirate Cockroach Simulator, you can play online for free with a friend by connecting online via the Internet. item.title: Marooners
item.description: Game Description Marooners is a fun arcade game that can be played in co-op online. The possibility of free online play allows you to plunge into a real world of chaos with your friends, competing in bright locations in a variety of biomes. item.title: Flat Heroes
item.description: Game Description Flat Heroes is represented by the opportunity to play pirate online for free with a friend, trying to survive together on a variety of crazy levels, solving numerous spatial puzzles over the Internet online or on a shared screen. item.title: Rogue Stormers
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Rogue Stormers you can play with a friend online, fighting together on the pirate for free against a huge variety of enemies and bosses. item.description: Game Description On the pirated version of Mother Russia Bleeds you can play online with a friend online, using all the multiplayer features of the project for free. item.title: Farm Expert 2017
item.description: Game Description Farm Expert 2017 is a farmer simulator that you can play online with a friend on a pirate for free. item.title: ONE PIECE BURNING BLOOD
item.description: Game Description The dynamic fighting game ONE PIECE BURNING BLOOD provides the opportunity to play a pirate game online with a friend. All fighters, accessories and other additional content are provided for free, including 4 unique heroes, 9 alternative skins, 14 costumes and 5 different interface types. The online game ONE PIECE BURNING BLOOD allows you to hone your skills by fighting with the most experienced fighters from around the world.

item.title: Redout: Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description Redout: Enhanced Edition offers free multiplayer and online play. This game allows you to enjoy racing for free with a friend, even on a pirate, and online online. item.description: Game Description Lost Castle is an action roguelike for playing with a friend or for completing a campaign online online with up to four people. item.title: Titan Quest Anniversary Edition

item.title: Livelock
item.description: Game Description Livelock is a top-down shooter aimed at allowing pirates to play online for free with a friend by connecting online via the Internet. item.title: GOD EATER 2 Rage Burst
item.description: Game Description GOD EATER 2 Rage Burst is an action role-playing game with the ability to play online for free on a pirate’s account with a friend, fighting online against supernatural creatures over the Internet. item.title: Last Will
item.description: Game Description Last Will allows you to play online for free with a friend, exploring a mysterious mansion online together over the Internet. item.title: Attack on Titan/A.O.T. Wings of Freedom
item.description: Game Description Play online with a friend in Attack on Titan / A.O.T. Wings of Freedom, or fight alone against the huge Titans - the choice of every fighter. It is only important to protect the city walls from the invasion of bloodthirsty monsters. On pirates, you can unite in coalitions, exterminating giants online on the Internet, preventing them from reaching the last human bastion. All fighters are available for free at launch.

item.title: Ultimate Arena FPS
item.description: Game Description In Ultimate Arena FPS you can play online with a friend on a pirate for free, participating in intense multiplayer matches online over the Internet. The gameplay is a first-person arena shooter, where the main goal is to destroy all opponents in the location. Multiplayer allows you to choose a hero and pick up 12 different types of weapons. These can be both small-caliber guns and heavy weapons.

item.title: Worms W.M.D
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Worms W.M.D you can play for free online with a friend, fighting locally or online online. A two-dimensional arcade game aimed at confronting worms, fighting on interactive maps and using a variety of weapons. Worms: Weapons of Mass Destruction allows you to fight in a clan showdown with players around the world. The possibility of free online play allows you to choose your units, arming them with different guns and equipment.

item.title: INVERSUS Deluxe
item.description: Game Description INVERSUS Deluxe is a two-dimensional scrolling shooter that offers the opportunity to play online with a friend, fighting for free in intense confrontations on a pirate. You can compete online or on one device. The gameplay contains elements of action and strategy. The essence of the competition is that you need to show your skills on a unique checkered field that is randomly generated. Competitions are available from 2 to 4 participants.

item.title: No Man's Sky
item.description: Game Description The pirate version of No Man’s Sky allows you to play online for free with a friend as you travel the galaxy. The game is a first-person simulator set in an open world. Using the opportunity of a free online game, you need to explore an entire universe, the planets of which are randomly generated. When landing on the surface of the continents, you will encounter generated biomes, creatures, etc.

item.title: No Man's Sky
item.description: Game Description Travel on an intergalactic level has become too simple and ordinary. It’s becoming increasingly difficult to create a game that captivates with its graphics, but the developers of No Man’s Sky, an indie adventure game with an open world and a wonderful RPG base, were able to recreate the image of space. Distant, limitless, completely open and so human. We play as a character, but then our gameplay switches to an entire space station or ship.

item.title: Half Dead
item.description: Game Description Half Dead is a competitive game designed to fight with a friend or random players online online. You can play pirate online for free, fighting in co-op or facing off against enemies in various competitive modes. The setting immerses you in the world of the future, where the participants in the adventure become hostages of a cruel TV show. Its essence is survival. It is necessary to overcome a huge number of traps and obstacles, as well as fight with other players, trying to survive in this madness.

item.title: Tricky Towers
item.description: Game Description Tricky Towers can be played online with a friend. The puzzle game allows a pirate to build vertical towers from colored blocks for free, playing with a friend online. You are allowed to use magic to help yourself or to destroy your opponent’s tower if you play in competition mode. The online game is quite simple: you need to place blocks on top of each other. It is very important that even though the tower grows, it does not lose balance.

item.title: Crush Your Enemies
item.description: Game Description Crush Your Enemies provides the opportunity to play pirated online for free with a friend, competing in a classic strategic confrontation over the Internet online or on a shared screen. The mechanics of Crush Your Enemies include developing your own base, training units, resource management, attacking enemy villages and much more. Events take place in the world of Typicia. Evil barbarians, thirsty for blood, live here. They love to tear off heads, drink beer and swear loudly.

item.title: RWBY Grimm Eclipse
item.description: Game Description RWBY Grimm Eclipse is an anime action game with the ability to play online with a friend or compete in a pirate game online. item.title: The Room Two
item.description: Game Description A puzzle game where in the first part you manipulated a magic clock mechanism. In the second part of the game, they were given the opportunity to walk around different rooms, solving various riddles. The Room Two - Follows a mysterious path with the help of letters from a scientist known as “AS”. The hero is trapped in a pocket dimension. He must find the author of the notes.

item.title: Table Top Racing: World Tour
item.description: Game Description Table Top Racing: World Tour is a racing action game that you can play online for free with a friend, driving 12 unique cars available for customization. The championship mode allows you to go through 20 race tracks together online over the Internet, represented by different features and biomes. Table Top Racing: World Tour multiplayer also features various Special Events. The possibility of free online play allows up to 8 players to participate simultaneously.

item.title: DOOM (2016)
item.description: Game Description DOOM 2016, unlike DOOM Ethernal, has less dynamics, but is more related to the horror genre. We can say that it began the evolution of the series towards speed and platforming, and it is considered closer in spirit to the series than its brother released in 2020. It was the first step towards a global rethinking of the franchise. The game takes place inside the corridors of a giant research complex.

item.title: TransOcean 2: Rivals
item.description: Game Description In TransOcean 2: Rivals you have the opportunity to play online for free as a pirate with a friend, building shipbuilding and developing your shipping company. You can play alone or online online, creating your own company both in co-op and competing for the title of the best businessman. It is necessary to join the international race for the most profitable contracts, developing your port and constructing massive transport ships.

item.title: Stellaris
item.description: Game Description Stellaris is a global strategy that allows you to play online with a friend on a pirate, using all available network features for free. You can fight online online or compete locally. Participants will have to explore space, rule a power, engage in military craft and resolve diplomatic issues. The universe in Stellaris is randomly generated. Each player takes control of one of the interstellar empires. Using the opportunity of a free online game, opposing factions need to achieve victory in two ways: win on points, or destroy all enemy troops.

item.title: Stellaris
item.description: Game Description Real-time strategy - Stellaris - immerses us in outer space, where we become kings of the galaxy from the very first minutes. The gameplay surrounds you with a huge number of ships and their types. For example, merchant spaceships will travel between different planets and sell/buy resources, reconnaissance ships will be able to explore new distances, and construction ships will help occupy - for friendly purposes - a new planet and recreate an entire empire on it.

item.title: Offworld Trading Company
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Offworld Trading Company you can play online for free, competing with a friend or company. An online Internet connection and the ability to play on a shared screen are available. The project is made in a sci-fi setting, allowing you to explore Mars. The difference between Offworld Trading Company and many other RTS is that there are no battles between participants. Victory is achieved only through economic skills and diplomacy.

item.title: Wayward
item.description: Game Description Wayward is an open-world survival game that you can play for free online as a pirate with a friend or players from all over the world. Locally or online, you need to go explore vast territories to find treasures. Online play allows you to compete and play cooperatively. Game mechanics include turn-based battles and roguelike elements. Wayward’s gameplay is based on exploration and survival. You can travel to 4 different continents.

item.title: Don't Starve Together
item.description: Game Description Don’t Starve Together is an open-world survival simulator that allows you to join forces with a friend as a pirate for free to fight, farm, build and explore procedurally generated locations, or participate in online confrontations over the Internet. Players find themselves in the vast wilderness, where, as night falls, the local fauna becomes incredibly bloodthirsty. The only thing monsters are afraid of is fire. A torch or fire is an indispensable weapon against night creatures.

item.title: Don't Starve Together
item.description: Game Description Don’t Starve Together is a survival simulator in an unknown world, where our character, pre-selected in the editor, wakes up and immediately goes to look for firewood, because Maxwell said so. The game is cooperative, since the story passage is divided into 2 parts. The first is survival. It is built on three phases of the day: day, evening and night. During the day, your character calmly survives, collects items, crafts new ones, eats and carries out orders for Maxwell.

item.title: Ice Lakes
item.description: Game Description You can play the fishing simulator Ice Lakes online with a friend, doing ice fishing for free on a pirate site, or compete online online in a variety of modes. The gameplay is a sandbox in which each player can do whatever they want. The possibility of free online play allows you to customize gear, select fishing rods, nets, boats and much more. Seasons, weather conditions, time of day and topography affect the fish in lakes.

item.title: SpeedRunners
item.description: Game Description SpeedRunners is a dynamic 2D platformer that allows you to play online with a friend or in the company of four people. You can play pirated for free both online online and using a local connection. Mechanics allow you to run, jump, dodge enemy attacks, use a wide arsenal of weapons and much more. The online game is based on confrontation, where the main goal is to throw opponents off the screen.

item.title: Twilight Struggle
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Twilight Struggle you can play online for free with a friend, taking control of the USA or the USSR. Players can compete online online or locally. Events take place during the Cold War. Multiplayer and single player campaign are based on historical events. The gameplay allows you to plan an offensive strategy, achieving world domination. The possibility of free online play, each new session poses different conditions and tasks, increasing the replayability of the project.

item.title: DARK SOULS 3
item.description: Game Description DARK SOULS 3 - continuation of the hardcore action with role-playing game elements. On the pirate DARK SOULS 3, you can play online with a friend for free, fighting each other online online and invading other people’s worlds to demonstrate your superiority. Multiplayer also allows you to view clues left by adventurers around the world. DARK SOULS III takes place in Lothric. The protagonists need to return the lords of ash to their thrones.

item.title: DARK SOULS 3
item.description: Game Description The gameplay of DARK SOULS 3 provides all the same opportunities that were in the second part. For us, a third-person slasher with elements of stealth and survival remained at the same level in terms of combat, but the entire combat system was made more dynamic. So much so that sometimes we don’t have time to jump away to recharge our skill, and they already kill us. The real hassle and face of the game genre is difficulty at every turn.

item.title: Tower Unite
item.description: Game Description Tower Unite - a virtual party for playing together on the Internet online, or for single play. Together with a friend or other players, you can play pirate online, participating in different types of competitions. Once in a huge shopping complex with entertainment, you are offered to try out every attraction or challenge other players completely free of charge. A total of 22 types of arcade competitions are available.

item.title: StarsOne
item.description: Game Description StarsOne is a unique online game that allows you to play online with friends or other players from around the world. You can download the game for free and play it pirated without paying a penny for a subscription or additional content. The game supports the possibility of free network play via the Internet online, so you can always find a partner or opponent for joint adventures. Explore randomly generated planets, develop your own industry, engage in trade, establish colonies and unravel the mysteries of space.

item.title: Kill to Collect
item.description: Game Description Kill to Collect is a top-down action game that can be played online online, competing with a friend or teaming up to complete a single-player campaign. All multiplayer content is available for free on pirate sites. You can play online or fight on one device. The setting is made in the cyberpunk genre. The free-to-play feature allows you to team up with up to four people to clear futuristic, procedurally generated maps.

item.title: Enter the Gungeon
item.description: Game Description Enter the Gungeon is a scrolling shooter that you can play for free with a friend, teaming up on a pirate to go through all the obstacles available in the story campaign online together. The goal is to get to the legendary treasury of the Gungeon. The path is not easy, but using the opportunity of a free online game, together with your partner you can overcome all the traps and defeat the fierce bosses.

item.title: Enter the Gungeon
item.description: Game Description In Enter the Gungeon you will remember such a genre as bullet hell or “hell of bullets”. The main characters explore the Gungeon and try to find a legendary artifact - a weapon that can kill the past. To do this, you need to fight your way through hordes of monsters and defeat formidable bosses. Loot, secrets, penny-pinching merchants and shopkeepers, new equipment and more loot - the recipe for a good game.

item.title: Hot Dogs, Horseshoes and Hand Grenades
item.description: Game Description The game Hot Dogs, Horseshoes and Hand Grenades can be called a full-fledged weapons simulator. You need to go to the training ground, which contains a huge selection of different firearms: pistols, machine guns, shotguns, rocket launchers, grenades, etc. You can use any available ammunition, training on targets and taking the highest positions on the leaderboard. Afterwards you can go and set off fireworks. Targets can be not only static within the walls of a gray pavilion, but also moving in open space.

item.title: Modbox
item.description: Game Description Modbox is a multiplayer sandbox with the ability to play online with a friend on a pirate for free or connect online with players from all over the world. The gameplay is based on physics and destruction. Network play is available in splitscreen mode. You can play cooperatively and compete with each other. The free online play feature includes matches for up to 4 people and supports cross-platform play.

item.title: CHKN
item.description: Game Description Sandbox CHKN allows you to explore a fantasy world with a friend or alone. For free on the pirate CHKN, players can take part in all online competitions by connecting online via the Internet. If you play online, you can travel in a cooperative adventure, or enter into confrontation, demonstrating your superiority in the arena - the possibility of free online play allows you to express yourself in any form.

item.title: Hyper Light Drifter
item.description: Game Description Hyper Light Drifter can be played online for free as a pirate, playing through the campaign online or on one screen. The gameplay is fast-paced action with role-playing elements. At the center of the story is a hero nicknamed the Tramp, aka Drifter. In battle, you will have to use technologies long forgotten by the inhabitants of the future world. The online game Hyper Light Drifter allows you to travel together through the ruins of civilization.

item.title: Of Carrots And Blood
item.description: Game Description Of Carrots And Blood is a twin-stick shooter in which you can play online with a friend, fighting together for free on a pirate ship with enemies or competing with each other online. The gameplay contains elements of survival and bullet hell. The possibility of free online play offers the opportunity to fight with a huge crowd of mutants in a company or alone. Despite its cute cartoon style, the project stands out for its abundance of blood and violence.

item.title: Congo
item.description: Game Description Congo is a top-down shooter that you can play online with a friend, going through a rich story campaign together on a pirate ship for free. Using the Internet online, you can form a team with other players to fight an army of demons. Events develop in the thickets of the Congo. The network game is aimed at interaction between partners. It is necessary to cover your comrades while holding back waves of enemies.

item.title: Moon Hunters
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Moon Hunters you can play online for free with a friend, going on a co-op journey online together. Game mechanics rely on role-playing elements and dynamic real-time combat. The project contains roguelike elements. therefore the environment is randomly generated. The possibility of free online play allows you to join a company of up to four people. Each new race creates a unique myth, which is written by the players themselves.

item.title: Ultimate Chicken Horse
item.description: Game Description Ultimate Chicken Horse is a team platformer that you can play for free online as a pirate with a friend, participating in a variety of cooperative or competitive modes over the Internet online. Each player chooses an animal character. The goal in Ultimate Chicken Horse is extremely prosaic and simple - you need to build a platform and move towards the finish line. At the same time, you need to overcome obstacles and score points.

item.title: E.T. Armies
item.description: Game Description E.T. Armies is a first-person shooter that you can play with a friend online, going through a story campaign together online. Events take place in the distant future, when the Earth is in ruins. A new nation grew out of the remains of a previous civilization. All the new generation needs is war. People are fighting for the remaining resources. Humanity left the planet, but not everyone was able to do so.

item.title: Bus Simulator 16
item.description: Game Description Bus Simulator 16 is a bus simulator that allows you to play online with a friend for free on a pirate, driving 13 types of transport, including the famous Mercedes-Benz and MAN bus models. Alone or together with friends online, you must follow traffic rules, transport passengers through five developed areas, adhere to a schedule, and much more. Two-door, three-door and articulated transport models are presented. A network game is aimed at confrontation or cooperation between participants.

item.title: Stardew Valley
item.description: Game Description Stardew Valley is a farming simulator that allows you to play as a pirate with a friend. A local connection and the possibility of online co-op are available. All network functions are available for free. Game mechanics allow you to develop your own farm in the Stradju Valley. Alone or in a group, you need to turn the desert into a real blooming garden. With only one tool in hand and almost zero money in your pocket, you need to build a new life.

item.title: Stardew Valley
item.description: Game Description Stardew Valley is a sandbox simulator with pixel graphics and multi-platform support, but with a well-thought-out system for earning money and maintaining game balance for the player. The beginning of the game shows how our hero first comes to an abandoned farm, which he received from a deceased relative. Since the protagonist does not mind making money by planting and selling vegetables and fruits, he decides not to sell the farm, but to start equipping it.

item.title: Grim Dawn
item.description: Game Description Grim Dawn can be played for free on pirates online with a friend or random players. An online Internet connection is available, which allows you to go through the story campaign together. Gloomy Dawn is an action role-playing game. The gameplay centers on collecting loot, armor, potions, weapons, gold, etc. Free online play includes crafting, allowing you to collaborate on new tools and weapons. The project is inspired by the mechanics of Titan Quest, from which it absorbed many elements and significantly improved them.

item.title: Grim Dawn
item.description: Game Description The gloomy dawn in Grim Dawn showed that the fabric of the created universe was too weak, so Cairn accepted robbers, bandits, magicians and a bunch of all kinds of creatures and undead into its embrace. Dark times have come to the territory of Cairn. But after that, people did not give up trying to attack their enemies, and called aliens into the world. They opened portals for them and let in several individuals to receive ether.

item.title: Obliterators
item.description: Game Description Obliteracers - dynamic races designed for competitions on the Internet online. You can play online for free with a friend or fight on a pirate for up to 16 players at the same time. You need to get behind the wheel of fancy futuristic cars and rush across the surface of various exotic planets. Transport is represented by realistic physics. Each car handles differently and contains unique characteristics.

item.title: Plague Inc Evolved
item.description: Game Description Plague Inc Evolved allows you to play online with a friend as you try to cope with a global pandemic. Versus mode is available via the Internet online and cooperative. The pirate Plague Inc Evolved supports cross-platform for free. The gameplay is strategy and simulation elements. It is necessary to destroy the entire world as Patient Zero. Using the opportunity of a free online game with a partner, do not let people solve the main questions in the field of medicine.

item.title: Toy Soldiers: Complete
item.description: Game Description Toy Soldiers: Complete immerses gamers in a familiar atmosphere where toy soldiers wreak havoc to the fullest potential. The ability to play online with a friend on a pirate allows you to move away from the usual single-player campaign and challenge other users to test your own skills. This is no longer the usual reflection of waves, but a full-scale battle, where, with the option of online gameplay over the Internet, every piece of territory will have to be conquered.

item.title: Dying Light: The Following
item.description: Game Description Dying Light: The Following is an add-on to the survival horror game Dying Light, which was released in 2015. In this add-on you will find a new location, new weapons, new gameplay elements and a new difficulty level. You will also have the opportunity to play online for free with a friend over the Internet, even if you have a pirated version. This is a great way to play a fun and scary game online.

item.title: Rise of the Tomb Raider
item.description: Game Description On the pirate version of Rise of the Tomb Raider you can play online with a friend for free. Rise of the Tomb Raider continues the storyline of the previous part. In addition to the story campaign, you can play online online, competing with players around the world. This time, Lara Croft goes to Siberia to find an oasis of immortality. Once again she will be opposed by members of the Trinity Order.

item.title: Rise of the Tomb Raider
item.description: Game Description Our task in Rise of the Tomb Raider is to get ahead of your enemies, go on your first expedition and watch interactive videos, of which there are at least 1.5 hours of gameplay in the game. Lara Croft goes to the unknown world of the city of Kitezh. A secret organization called “Trinity” is also heading there. The principle of the game about Lara is an adventure game mixed with the adventure romance of the first journey, in which we kill with a bow, collect important items, and sometimes survive in the wild.

item.title: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 4
item.description: Game Description Familiar to many fans of the Naruto series, NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 4 transcends the fighting game genre, taking the game to the next level. In the final part, we will find out who will win in the confrontation between Naruto and Sasuke. We will learn a lot of details about the 4th Shinobi War, and also go over some aspects of the anime that were missed in previous parts.

item.title: XCOM 2
item.description: Game Description XCOM 2 is a turn-based tactical strategy in which you can fight with a friend on a pirate or play for free online with other participants. Co-op missions are available and the opportunity to arrange a full-scale battle over the Internet online with different players from all over the world. Compared to the first part, the gameplay has not changed much. The mechanics combine elements of TBS and RPG, and the possibility of free online play includes control of one of the presented races, which have unique abilities and battle tactics.

item.title: XCOM 2
item.description: Game Description Twenty years ago, people signed an act of complete surrender of the earth to the aliens. Another civilization has shown that there is no hope for salvation, and therefore alien invaders have taken over the entire planet. At the beginning of XCOM 2 we are shown a video from the current ruler of the planet (in fact, this is a staged, drawn character, he is controlled by aliens), who says that today is the day when the aliens captured us, and the earth plunged into peace; Today we celebrate 20 years of freedom.

item.title: Fortified
item.description: Game Description Fortified is a tactical shooter with the ability to play online with a friend for free on a pirate, taking part in dynamic shootouts online online. The action takes place in 1950, when the Martians arrived on Earth with the further enslavement of humanity. Multiplayer Fortified is designed for four people. Together with your partners, you will need to destroy hordes of enemies using a wide arsenal of weapons from the Cold War.

item.title: Infinitesimal Point
item.description: Game Description Infinitesimal Point is an action-adventure game that gives you the opportunity to play online on a pirate for free. You can team up with a friend to go through an intense single-player campaign online. The story of Infinitesimal Point begins with the main characters being transported to another dimension after a brutal attack. In this world, danger awaits at every step. Online play allows teammates to go through many challenges and fight a huge crowd of monsters.

item.title: American Truck Simulator
item.description: Game Description American Truck Simulator is an American truck driver simulator that allows you to play online with a friend to transport cargo over long distances. Using an online Internet connection, you can explore the United States together. The project was developed in parallel with the game Euro Truck Simulator 2. The main emphasis of the gameplay is on realistic controls and heavy transport physics. Each of the 9 trucks presented for free on the pirate site has unique characteristics: Kenworth T680, Peterbilt 579, Kenworth W900, Peterbilt 389, Volvo VNL, International LoneStar, Mack Anthem, Western Star 49X and Freightliner Cascadia.

item.title: American Truck Simulator
item.description: Game Description American Truck Simulator doesn’t have the typical pick-up-and-drop-off. This is a strategic and economic simulator rolled into one: we will upgrade our trucks, buy new ones, decide which contracts to take on and what to leave aside. An important component in the process is the driving itself, because it is done in the first person, from the driver’s cabin. Compliance with all traffic rules is the basis and responsibility of every driver.

item.title: Cobalt
item.description: Game Description Cobalt is a two-dimensional platformer that gives you the opportunity to discover the secrets of a space colony together with a friend. You can play Cobalt on the Pirate for free online, going through various tests together over the Internet online. The key mechanic is time dilation. Multiplayer allows you to go through a campaign together to answer the most important question: what happened to humanity? An equally important question is why ride a space hamster?

item.title: Blood and Bacon
item.description: Game Description Blood and Bacon is a co-op shooter that you can play online with a friend. Several types of multiplayer competitions are available for free on the pirate market, allowing you to fight online on the Internet. The gameplay is a classic FPS. Network play allows you to fight in both day and night locations. There are 35 enemies and several unique bosses with their own individual attack patterns. Intermediate minibosses appear every 10 levels.

item.title: LEGO MARVEL's Avengers
item.description: Game Description LEGO MARVEL’s Avengers brings the brick-and-mortar superhero action back to consoles and PC. In this game you can play online with a friend on a pirate, which allows you to immerse yourself in the world of Marvel for free. The online game features combat and puzzles that recreate epic moments from the Cinematic Universe. You’ll be able to build, destroy, and explore seven hub worlds, including New York and Sokovia, in exciting online adventures.

item.title: Move or Die
item.description: Game Description Move or Die is a casual adventure designed for online competitions. You can play online with a friend, or use a local connection for free on a pirate. A special feature of the gameplay is that the rules change every 20 seconds, so the possibility of a free online game invites each participant to express themselves to the maximum in order to adapt to fleeting game processes. The online game Move or Die tests the strength of the participants' relationships!

item.title: Crashlands
item.description: Game Description Crashlands allows you to play pirate alone or with a friend online. The cooperative is also available online. The indie title itself is an open-world survival simulator with role-playing elements. It uses 2D hand-drawn graphics. The camera is located at the top and at an angle. The large map is divided into 3 continents, which consist of several biomes, and is inhabited by 4 races. Crashlands has a plot that is presented with humor.

item.title: Homeworld: Deserts of Kharak
item.description: Game Description On the pirate version of Homeworld: Deserts of Kharak you can play online with a friend completely free of charge, competing in confrontation modes online. The strategy takes place on the surface of the planet Kharak. It is necessary for a ground-based aircraft carrier to collect resources, train an army, study technologies and engage in battle with the enemy. Network play allows you not only to fight with your opponent, but also to complete joint missions in co-op.

item.title: Scrap Mechanic
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Scrap Mechanic you can play online for free with a friend, building your own unique world. Allows you to join forces locally or online online. Alone or together with partners, you need to explore the open world, collect resources, build and fight off waves of farm bots. The online game focuses on the creative side of gameplay, mixing construction with survival elements. Each member of Scrap Mechanic takes on the role of a robot mechanic, setting out to explore the picturesque landscapes of a fictional world.

item.title: Scrap Mechanic
item.description: Game Description Scrap Mechanic is a multiplayer engineering sandbox that offers you to design various mechanisms and compete with friends. The game world revolves around a mechanic who maintains robots on an agricultural planet. He makes sure that they are working properly: that they are cultivating the land on time, sowing, collecting raw materials, which the hero then sends to the central planets, where people live ordinary lives. But one day the spaceship crashed, and the robots around went crazy.

item.title: Darkest Dungeon
item.description: Game Description Darkest Dungeon is a hardcore RPG with roguelike elements that allows you to team up on a pirate ship with a friend to play online for free or compete with other players online. The project stands out for its dark artistic execution in the Gothic style. The main mechanic is that the style of gameplay directly affects the emotional balance of the heroes. This parameter is called Stress. You have to assemble your team, where each participant has unique skills and abilities.

item.title: Darkest Dungeon
item.description: Game Description Turn-based strategy with a side view - Darkest Dungeon - developed in a dark style and with rogue-like elements. A huge number of characters will not let you calm down until everyone on the playing field creates the perfect combination for victory. Each battle with opponents is a fascinating tactical adventure, where victory is 80% knowledge of the game and 20% knowledge of logic. Your characters are ordinary people with extraordinary health.

item.title: Feed and Grow: Fish
item.description: Game Description Feed and Grow: Fish is a multiplayer simulator of the underwater world, which you can play for free as a pirate online with a friend, alone, or compete on the Internet online with random players. The exploration features an ocean where participants, in the role of a sea creature, must survive in a harsh underwater environment. It is necessary to feed on local flora or fauna in order to grow into a larger individual.

item.title: Whos Your Daddy
item.description: Game Description Whos Your Daddy is a fun dad simulator that you can play online with a friend. Pirate players connect to a dedicated server for free when playing online on the Internet. The bottom line is that one takes on the role of the father, and the second - the baby. It is noteworthy that both stand out for their obtuseness. As a result, the possibility of free online play offers hapless couch potatoes to survive until the end of the day: dad needs to not go crazy, while the baby needs to be more mischievous.

item.title: River City Super Sports Challenge All Stars Special
item.description: Game Description River City Super Sports Challenge All Stars Special is a sports competition that offers the opportunity to play online over the Internet. You can take part in four different disciplines for free on Pirate. You can play online with a friend on the same screen or compete with random people. Competitions are presented with survival mechanics. You need to use wooden swords, dumbbells, bombs and many other improvised means.

item.title: Reign Of Kings
item.description: Game Description Reign Of Kings is an open-world survival game designed to play online with a friend, fighting together on the Internet online, or on a pirate platform for free, participating in confrontations with random players from all over the world. Online play allows you to hunt wild animals, obtain resources, build a base, create armor, etc. Free online play includes creating your own guilds. You can declare war on different factions and associations.

item.title: The Mean Greens - Plastic Warfare
item.description: Game Description The Mean Greens - Plastic Warfare is an arcade shooter about toy soldiers, in which you can play online as a pirate for free, fighting with a friend or an entire team. A cooperative mode is available online on the Internet, allowing you to unite against artificial intelligence or a common enemy. Mechanics allow you to run, jump, shoot, use cover and the environment. The online game is aimed at confronting two plastic armies: green and brown.

item.title: Dirt Rally
item.description: Game Description Dirt Rally gives players the opportunity to play online for free and compete against a friend in exciting rally racing. Go to competition stages in different terrains and weather conditions, and test your skills behind the wheel of cars of different decades and classes. The game provides a unique opportunity for free online gaming on the Internet. Initially, Dirt Rally had 36 stages in three locations, but with the release of updates, even more opportunities appeared.

item.title: HELLDIVERS
item.description: Game Description On the pirate HELLDIVERS you can play online with a friend, taking part in all multiplayer modes for free. By controlling the Hell Marines, you can take part in intense battles over the Internet, online or locally. The Marines are an elite force protecting Super-Earth from an alien threat. Alone or in a team, you need to become a participant in an intergalactic war. HELLDIVERS multiplayer includes a Proving Grounds that allows you to play campaign missions with various modifications.

item.title: Zombie Vikings
item.description: Game Description In Zombie Vikings, up to four players can team up online to experience an action-packed campaign together. You can play pirate for free online, fighting in co-op with a friend or random players. The story centers on zombie Vikings who set off in search of the lost eye of Odin himself. As you might guess, Loki himself stole the eye. The online game Zombie Vikings allows you to go through the storyline in the company, fighting numerous monsters and creatures of darkness.

item.title: Nuclear Throne
item.description: Game Description Action roguelike Nuclear Throne immerses you in a post-apocalyptic world, where you can go for free on a pirate ship with a friend. You can play online, overcoming traps and obstacles together. Using the Internet online, you can interact with a partner, exchanging resources or covering a friend’s back. The gameplay is distinguished by intense shootings and high dynamics of what is happening on the screen. The online game invites you to team up with a partner to become the last hope of all humanity.

item.title: CITYCONOMY: Service for your City
item.description: Game Description CITYCONOMY: Service for your City invites players to plunge into the world of municipal management. You can play this exciting online game online with a friend for free, even on a pirate site. You will become an operator of the city service, which is responsible for the functioning of key departments. You will have to work online via the Internet, performing important tasks on which the life of the city depends.

item.title: Rainbow Six: Siege
item.description: Game Description Rainbow Six: Siege is a tactical shooter that allows you to compete with a friend or random players online. Rainbow 6: Siege gives you the opportunity to play online for free on pirates in asymmetrical matches between attack aircraft and defenders. Network play takes place in a limited space. The main feature is that the buildings are completely susceptible to destruction. You can blow up walls, ceilings, furniture, etc.

item.title: The Isle
item.description: Game Description The island on which The Isle takes place has a rich and varied environment that is randomly generated. All artifacts, items and events will be located in different places with each new launch. Players must team up to effectively explore the area, which contains many secrets, including various quest items that further advance the plot. The map contains an area of ​​16x16 square kilometers. Multiplayer survival game The Isle allows you to play with three different factions in three different modes:

item.title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
item.description: Game Description A new installment in the first-person shooter, Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Siege is a game of multiplayer destruction. We will not just destroy the map to which we and our friends were sent, but we will build traps, plant a bomb, and all this at a distance of a bow shot. The technical equipment of the new part is made specifically so that you can blow up everything in the open location of each level.

item.title: Just Cause 3
item.description: Game Description The pirate version of Just Cause 3 offers the opportunity to play online for free with a friend, exploring the Mediterranean island of the Medici and blowing up everything online online. You can play cooperatively or compete with each other. Online play allows you to arm yourself with a huge variety of weapons and explosives, blowing up everything in your path, from cars to buildings. The main character of the plot is Rico Rodriguez, whom the government sends to the dictatorial island of General Sebastiano Di Ravello.

item.title: Just Cause 3
item.description: Game Description Just Cause 3 is a continuation of the famous franchise about the adventures of a specially trained agent named Rico Rodriguez. This part of the series did not deviate from the style and genre of previous games in the universe where the mercenary nicknamed “Scorpio” lives. The end of the trilogy is made with the same driving action, open world, a large number of tricks and devices available in the protagonist’s arsenal, and an adventure plot in which the fate of an entire state will be at stake.

item.title: Mordheim: City of the Damned
item.description: Game Description Mordheim: City of the Damned provides the opportunity to compete online on the Internet, participating in various multiplayer modes for free on pirates. You can play with a friend, fighting in co-op or against random people. The game mechanics are action with a touch of tactical RPG. The action takes place in the Warhammer Fantasy universe. The setting is reminiscent of Renaissance Europe. It is necessary to go to the streets of the city of Mordheim, fighting among themselves for fragments of the stone of distortion.

item.title: Knight Squad
item.description: Game Description Knight Squad can be played online with a friend, participating in a variety of online competitions over the Internet. On Pirate you can fight with 8 players at the same time for free. Each player chooses his own knight and equips himself with fun weapons. The online game is represented by many different competitions. Football fields, railways, ice skating rinks and much more are available. The possibility of free online play allows you to fight in teams, participating in confrontations against a group of other knights.

item.title: Life is Feudal: Your Own
item.description: Game Description In Life is Feudal: Your Own you have to survive alone or play online with a friend, exploring the vastness of the medieval open world. PvP content is available, allowing you to fight other players for free on a pirate. The gameplay is a feudal lord simulator with survival elements in the open world. The gameplay allows you to engage in terraforming. While exploring the open world, you need to collect resources to craft tools, build a base, and much more.

item.title: Dispatcher
item.description: Game Description Dispatcher is a first-person horror game in which you can play online with a friend or participate in confrontations with other people on a pirate site for free. Co-op and multiplayer modes are available online online. Game mechanics contain RPG and puzzle elements. Dispatcher takes place in the world of the future. The ship the main character was on board is ambushed. Now she has to survive, fighting various alien monsters.

item.title: Fallout 4
item.description: Game Description Fallout 4 is a sequel to the famous role-playing game series in a post-apocalyptic setting. The player wakes up from cryosleep and discovers that he is the only survivor of Vault 111. Having made it to the surface, he finds himself in the Wasteland - a world destroyed by nuclear war. The gameplay includes: a free open world with hundreds of locations to explore, a huge number of NPCs, companions and quests, as well as interaction with many factions, including the Institute, the Brotherhood of Steel, the Minutemen and agents of the Underground; S.

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 3
item.description: Game Description On the pirated Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 for free, you can fight with players from all over the world or play online with a friend, participating in a variety of multiplayer modes. Over the Internet, online players can participate in ranked matches and fight in zombie mode. A jet booster is available, allowing you to run along walls or dash in the air. In addition to the Pick 10 system, various specialties are available in the form of a unique character with their own abilities.

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 3
item.description: Game Description The first-person shooter Call of Duty: Black Ops III demonstrates the blurred relationship between ordinary people and technology. In it you will forever forget that the new generation of soldiers is not a fiction, but a reality that will overtake us in the near future. Humanity has created technology to be leaders in the coming war, but will it be? The game shows this in three modes: story campaign, multiplayer shooter at scenario locations, and also in zombie mode.

item.title: Roguelands
item.description: Game Description In Roguelands you can play with a friend online, going on a fantasy adventure online together. Free on Pirates, each player takes on the role of a galactic cadet to travel across the entire universe in order to find valuable resources and loot, and using the opportunity of free online play together with a partner to save the galaxy from enemies. The land has been in ruins for a long time.

item.title: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Final Cut
item.description: Game Description In The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Final Cut you have the opportunity to play as a pirate for free online with a friend, going on an adventure through the Gothic world, fighting monsters online online. The final edition features 6 playable classes, a new mode, and free online play. Events take place in the world of Borgovia. Here, mad science rules the roost, and numerous monsters roam the lands.

item.title: Clandestine
item.description: Game Description Clandestine offers free pirate play online with a friend, doing espionage together as secret agents. On the Internet online, everyone takes on the role of one of two heroes: a spy - a master of stealth and a hacker - a professional cracker. Each of the heroes has its own skills and characteristics. Depending on the choice of character, the style of passage changes. The action takes place in 1996.

item.title: Euro Fishing
item.description: Game Description Euro Fishing is a fishing simulator that allows you to play online with a friend, competing for free on a pirate in various multiplayer competitions. You can connect with friends or random players online online to go to famous lakes throughout Europe. Online play allows you to fish in co-op or compete for the title of fishing champion. You need to develop your own tactics, choose the right equipment, tackle, fishing rods, etc.

item.title: THE GAME OF LIFE
item.description: Game Description The arcade game THE GAME OF LIFE gives you the opportunity to play pirated for free online with a friend or in a company of up to four people, competing online online in various multiplayer modes. The gameplay is made in the style of board games. Locations are presented in the form of a game board. The gameplay of THE GAME OF LIFE contains elements of a card battler.

item.title: MX vs. ATV Supercross Encore
item.description: Game Description MX vs. ATV Supercross Encore is an arcade racing simulator that allows you to race along 35 unique tracks with a friend, competing for free on a pirate. You can play online or enter into a confrontation locally. Online, you can take part in Rhythm Racing, ride the Nationals tracks and compete on open Waypoint maps. The network game is aimed at confrontation and cooperation. The gameplay emphasizes realistic physics and heavy controls.

item.title: Divinity Original Sin Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description Divinity Original Sin Enhanced Edition is a turn-based RPG that can be played online with a friend and several other friends. The full edition includes addons and improvements to the original Divinity for free, and also provides the opportunity for co-op playthroughs online. A cross-platform is available that allows you to play online on different devices. You need to assemble your team to go explore fantasy lands with your comrades, participating in turn-based battles, interacting with partners and the world, and also go through a huge number of single and secondary quests.

item.title: Epic Showdown
item.description: Game Description Epic Showdown is a three-dimensional platform that gives you the opportunity to play online with a friend on a pirate. All network functions are available for free. You can compete locally or face off against enemies online. The story centers on an alien who organizes his own reality show called Epic Showdown. He manages to gather the best fighters from all over the universe. Network play allows you to take control of any of the presented heroes.

item.title: Chaos Reborn
item.description: Game Description Chaos Reborn is a turn-based tactics game in which you can play online for free with a friend, fighting as a pirate in intense confrontations. You can team up online to play together on the Internet. The project is a direct successor to Chaos: The Battle of Wizards. The gameplay is based on turn-based combat, taking inspiration from the mechanics of chess and poker. The online game is represented by several leagues that allow you to demonstrate your superiority.

item.title: Viscera Cleanup Detail
item.description: Game Description Viscera Cleanup Detail is a first-person simulator that allows you to play online with a friend using a pirated LAN or an online Internet connection. The idea is that you need to get hired as a cleaner on a space station. Moreover, a station engaged in alien research. The work is not easy, but no one will work for free. Players wash the walls of blood, entrails and other obscenities, coming to the scene after shootouts with an alien life form.

item.title: Pure Pool
item.description: Game Description Pure Pool is a billiards simulator. In reality, this entertainment involves the presence of two or more participants who approach the table in turn, so that in the video game adaptation you can play with a friend over the network (including pirate games). Online multiplayer and hotsit are supported. Compared to other representatives of the genre, the title stands out with its sophisticated graphics. It emphasizes realism. In Pure Pool, the online game contains a leaderboard, quick meetings with randoms, leagues, and one-time games by invitation.

item.title: Overlord: Fellowship of Evil
item.description: Game Description Overlord: Fellowship of Evil is a spin-off of the Overlord role-playing game of the same name, which presents the opportunity to play online as a pirate. You can go through the campaign with a friend or with random players online online. Local co-op and online play available. The main difference from the original adventure is the change in camera perspective. The gameplay has moved to full isometry. The cooperative allows four participants to unite.

item.title: Broforce
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Broforce you can join forces with a friend, playing online for free, or destroy waves of enemies online online. Broforce is a fast-paced platformer that centers on a highly trained squad of commandos fighting to free other Bros from terrorist captivity. The task is completed when the main boss is killed, the American flag rises above the base, and the bros fly off into the sunset.

item.title: Broforce
item.description: Game Description Broforce is a powerful paramilitary organization that is called upon when the world is in danger due to an excessive number of evil forces. Take control of dozens of different brothers to counter terrorist attacks and save civilians. Destroy your opponents with napalm, shooting, lightning and other various character skills. Broforce is a 2D shooter platformer with pixel graphics. You will move around locations, destroying opponents in every possible way.

item.title: The Jackbox Party Pack 2
item.description: Game Description The Jackbox Party Pack 2 is a collection of competitions designed for online play on the Internet. The pirated version of The Jackbox Party Pack 2 can be played for free online with a friend or in a group of up to 8 people. A group of people compete with each other in various fun competitions. Cross-platform is supported, allowing participants to play from different devices. The collection includes 5 unique competitions.

item.title: WRC 5 FIA World Rally Championship
item.description: Game Description WRC 5 FIA World Rally Championship is a racing simulator designed to be played online with a friend, participating together in various competitions. On the pirate platform you can take part in world tournaments for free. On the Internet online, each player takes on a specific role: one acts as a driver, and the other becomes a navigator. The possibility of free online play allows you to interact with your partner in every possible way.

item.title: Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes
item.description: Game Description In Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes with a friend or in the company of other people online, you need to take on the role of a real sapper. On the pirate Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes, you can play online for free, or cooperate on one device. The only important thing is to defuse the bomb before the timer runs out. When the dial shows zeros, an explosion will occur and the game will be lost.

item.title: Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes
item.description: Game Description Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes is a cooperative sapper simulator. You are locked up with your friends. No one knows where the explosives are, but instructions are issued on how to disarm them. They must verbally explain what elements the bomb consists of and ensure that the player, acting as a sapper, can defuse it. Each round will be quite intense. Everything depends only on the correct and competent relationship between the participants.

item.title: Prison Architect
item.description: Game Description Prison Architect is a two-dimensional sandbox with construction elements that allows a pirate to play for free online with a friend, jointly creating a prison for the most ruthless maniacs. Using an online Internet connection, friends will need to become fierce bosses. Each player is able to build the correctional facility that he considers necessary for the stay of various inveterate bandits and murderers. It is necessary to extract resources in order to build new buildings and complexes.

item.title: SAMURAI WARRIORS 4-2
item.description: Game Description SAMURAI WARRIORS 4-2 is a continuation of the cult slasher game, in which you can play online as a pirate for free, fighting with a friend against a huge number of enemies. A confrontation mode is presented online on the Internet. The online game offers you to take control of Naomasa Ii, a hero who became playable for the first time in the series. There is a full-fledged Story Mode, as well as the possibility of free online play, allowing you to complete the campaign in a team.

item.title: Grand Ages: Medieval
item.description: Game Description Grand Ages: Medieval is a strategy game set in the Middle Ages. You can play online for free with a friend, competing on a pirate in various confrontation modes. There is also the opportunity to compete online with players from all over the world. The gameplay of Grand Ages: Medieval offers you to lead a nation, gradually increasing the standard of living of your people. You need to explore the area, expand your possessions, collect resources, engage in construction and conquest.

item.title: Tango Fiesta
item.description: Game Description Tango Fiesta is a dynamic arcade shooter that allows pirates to play for free online with a friend. The project is an ode to the action films of the 80s. All characters and events are caricatures of many famous characters. You can play on one screen or go through the campaign online online. Levels are generated randomly. Multiplayer allows you to choose one of several heroes. Each character wields a unique weapon and fights using individual tactics.

item.title: Blood Bowl 2
item.description: Game Description Blood Bowl 2 is a variation of American football in the Warhammer universe. On the pirate Blood Bowl 2, you can play online with a friend for free, participating online in a bloody mess. Gameplay Blood Bowl 2 is an adaptation of the board game of the same name. The game has a huge amount of violence and dark humor. The online game offers turn-based matches where you need to take turns making moves and trying to beat your opponent using tactics.

item.title: Overruled!
item.description: Game Description Overruled! is a dynamic platformer where you can play online with a friend. You can fight on a pirate ship for free in various locations, represented by several tiers. Participants fight on the same screen, or participate in confrontation over the Internet online. The possibility of free online play allows you to change the rules on the go. Victory is awarded to the one who scores the maximum number of victory points.

item.title: Undertale
item.description: Game Description In the universe of Undertale, a role-playing game with pixel graphics, a war broke out between humans and monsters. The people won and locked all the creatures from the other world in an underground wasteland. The underground world of the game tells the story of one boy who finds himself in a closed space with monsters. 7 magicians guarded the dungeon area using barrier spells, but somehow a baby got there, for whom we have to play.

item.title: Lovers in a Dangerous Spacetime
item.description: Game Description Lovers in a Dangerous Spacetime is a space shooter that can be played online online. A cooperative mode has been introduced, allowing you to play online with a friend for free on a pirate. By uniting as a team and coordinating actions, you will have to fight the forces of anti-love. The main goal is to save the space babies. The online game is designed for four people.

item.title: Rampage Knights
item.description: Game Description You can play Rampage Knights online either with a friend in co-op or with random players, teaming up on a pirate ship or fighting online online in PvP mode. All online features are available for free, including numerous heroes, equipment, weapons and modes. The gameplay is a two-dimensional beat-em-up, made in a dark fantasy setting. The campaign can be played alone, fighting numerous monsters, but by joining forces with a partner, the free multiplayer option opens up many additional mechanics, allowing the heroes to interact and solve puzzles together.

item.title: Armello
item.description: Game Description Armello can be played online with a friend or compete against other players around the world. An online Internet connection is available, and there is also a solo mode. All network functions are provided for free on the pirated version, allowing you to connect to external servers. The gameplay combines strategy, card game and RPG. The project is inspired by board games, trying to transfer the mechanics and rules of “live” adventures into a digital format.

item.title: Metal Gear Solid 5: The Phantom Pain
item.description: Game Description Metal Gear Solid 5: The Phantom Pain is a continuation of the famous series of stealth shooters from the recognized master of game design and production Hideo Kojima. The plot taking place in this game becomes a prequel to the very first game in the universe - Metal Gear. It forms a complete picture with the prologue released a little earlier - Metal Gear Solid V: Ground Zeroes.

item.title: Satellite Reign
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Satellite Reign you can play online for free with a friend or team up online with up to 4 people to go to the city of the future and prevent an evil mega-corporation from seizing power over the country. Multiplayer allows you to create your own group of four well-trained agents, where each team member performs his own individual function in the squad. Together with your partners, you will have to penetrate buildings, kill enemies, commit sabotage and bring down the largest monopoly in history.

item.title: Fran Bow
item.description: Game Description Fran Bow is an indie horror quest with unusual art and animation. The backdrops are made very attractively; you will want to explore the world of the game thanks to the interesting plot. A ten-year-old girl named Fran Bow-Dagenhart has been unhappy since childhood - her parents were killed. She was able to escape and later good people were able to find her in the forest. They really can’t help her.

item.title: Giana Sisters: Dream Runners
item.description: Game Description Giana Sisters: Dream Runners is a hyper-speed platformer about crazy sisters, which features an online competitive mode. On the pirate Giana Sisters: Dream Runners, you can play online with a friend for free. The competition is designed for four people. The main task is to overtake your rivals and leave them far behind. The player who reaches the finish line first wins. Along the way there are many obstacles in the form of barriers, abysses, teleports, etc.

item.title: Party Hard
item.description: Game Description Party Hard introduces the opportunity to play online with a friend for free on a pirate, trying to stop a loud party, both alone and online. Events develop at 3 am. The main character decides not to call the police, but tries to stop the noisy party himself. Network play allows participants to play both in co-op and to take completely different sides of the conflict. When controlling the hero, you need to hide in the crowd and not give yourself away.

item.title: Trine 3 The Artifacts of Power
item.description: Game Description Trine 3 The Artifacts of Power is a fantasy arcade game designed for cooperative play with a friend or online playthrough on the Internet with the participation of three participants. You can play online or on one device. All online features of Trine 3 The Artifacts of Power are available pirated. Skins, in-game content, characters, weapons and armor are unlocked for free, but some items must be unlocked through progression.

item.title: Warlocks vs Shadows
item.description: Game Description Warlocks vs Shadows can be played online for free as a pirate with a friend, going through the storyline in co-op or online online. A versus mode has been introduced that allows you to fight among yourself. The gameplay of Warlocks vs Shadows is inspired by old-school sidescrollers. Features action, RPG, platformer and puzzle elements. The online game invites warlocks to join forces, who must save the universe from monsters and fight powerful bosses.

item.title: Planetary Annihilation: TiTANS
item.description: Game Description Planetary Annihilation: TiTANS is an extensive expansion of the original strategy that allows you to play as a pirate for free online with a friend, fighting in a confrontation over the Internet online. At the beginning of the match, players must deploy a Commander who is capable of constructing basic buildings. You can hire new units there. They allow you to develop your base and study new technologies. Multiplayer games are built around destroying your opponent’s base.

item.title: BRAWL
item.description: Game Description BRAWL is a competitive game that provides the opportunity to play for free with a friend online, competing in interactive arenas. You can fight over the Internet online or locally. The gameplay immerses you in nightmares in which you need to overcome a bunch of traps and obstacles while clutching a bomb in your hand. A network game is aimed at confronting several people. Events take place in a dark and mystical world called Emporia.

item.title: Nom Nom Galaxy
item.description: Game Description Nom Nom Galaxy is a two-dimensional strategy game that allows you to play online with a friend, using an Internet connection online or competing locally. There are many network modes that are available on pirate sites for free. The action takes place in the SoupCo universe. You will play as the character Astroworker. His task is to build automated factories that produce soups. They need to be distributed throughout the galaxy.

item.title: Dead Realm
item.description: Game Description Horror adventure Dead Realm allows you to play online with a friend by connecting online via the Internet. Free on the pirate Dead Realm, you need to survive in a creepy mansion where ghosts and monsters roam. Gameplay Dead Realm is an intense first-person shooter. Online play allows you to take on the role of a survivor or any featured antagonist. The plot begins 100 years ago, when tycoon William Huxley murdered the entire family in his house, including the servants.

item.title: Breach & Clear: Deadline
item.description: Game Description Breach & Clear: Deadline is an isometric zombie survival game aimed at playing online with a friend, fighting in co-op mode over the Internet online. Free on the pirate Breach & Clear: Deadline, you need to join a group of survivors to fight an army of infected monsters. The virus is gradually spreading and with every passing minute the zombies are becoming more aggressive. An online game allows you to assemble a team of daredevils who are ready to sacrifice themselves in the name of saving humanity.

item.title: Worms World Party Remastered
item.description: Game Description Worms World Party Remastered is a re-release of a two-dimensional strategy about worms, in which it is possible to fight with a friend on a pirate for free. Worms: World Party allows you to play online in co-op or take part in online confrontations over the Internet. Worms World Party Remastered features improved graphics, support for widescreen monitors, leaderboards and other updates. The network game offers you to fight on one screen, taking turns making moves.

item.title: Rake
item.description: Game Description Rake is a first-person horror game that allows you to team up with a friend to play online for free on a pirate site. A confrontation mode and a cooperative game are available, offering online survival in the vastness of the wild over the Internet. The main character is researcher Gordon Davis. He travels to various mysterious lands of our planet to study various paranormal features and destroy myths about whether Chupacabras, Sasquatch, Skinwalkers and other monsters exist.

item.title: Coffin Dodgers
item.description: Game Description Coffin Dodgers can be played online with a friend for free, and you can also compete with people from all over the world online. Each participant chooses their own vehicle and character to destroy the Grim Reaper and his hordes of zombies. All players are armed with a variety of homemade weapons and auxiliary devices. Free online play allows you to compete on 13 unique interactive tracks. Coffin Dodgers gameplay includes: 7 characters with their own unique weapons; customization of wheelchairs; quirky ragdoll and physics; open world to explore; competitions for up to 4 people; single player mode and time trials.

item.title: BeamNG Drive
item.description: Game Description In BeamNG Drive you can play online online or take part in dynamic chases with artificial intelligence. The pirate game features a variety of online challenges and competitions for playing with a friend, or a set of single missions for playing alone. All machines, spare parts, components, etc. available for free or for in-game currency, which is awarded for winning races. The gameplay is based on realistic physics. This is especially true for soft objects, in particular rubber.

item.title: BeamNG drive
item.description: Game Description BeamNG.drive is a car simulator that simulates the behavior of cars during collisions. Excellent physics, realistic controls and spectacular accidents are the main features of the game. The simulator allows you to find out what the consequences will be if, for example, the steering wheel of a Ferrari jams and the car flies into the oncoming lane, where it collides with a 40-ton truck. Or assess the damage to an army jeep whose brakes jammed when it was going down a hill at a speed of 90 km/h, flew off the road and crashed into a tree.

item.title: GUILTY GEAR XX ACCENT CORE PLUS R
item.description: Game Description The fighting game GUILTY GEAR XX ACCENT CORE PLUS R is presented with the opportunity to play online for free on a pirate with a friend, taking control of one of 25 unique characters, including Cliff Anderson, Justice, Kai, Testament, I-no, Millia Rage and many others. You can fight in GUILTY GEAR XX ACCENT CORE PLUS R both online and locally on the same screen. All heroes have a special Gatling combo that involves pressing attack buttons in succession.

item.title: Magicka 2
item.description: Game Description Magicka 2 is an isometric role-playing game that allows you to play as a pirate online with a friend, using all available multiplayer modes for free. You can play through the campaign online or play locally. The adventure is set in a fantasy setting and contains a huge amount of humor. You have to explore the ruins of Aldrheim and study the lands of Midgard, destroyed by magicians after the protracted Wizard War.

item.title: NASCAR 15 Victory Edition
item.description: Game Description NASCAR 15 Victory Edition is a car simulator that serves as the official NASCAR game. You can team up with a friend on a pirate to play various licensed tournament competitions online for free. You can compete with each other on the Internet online. The simulator features all the cars, sponsors and drivers of the 2015 season. Single player campaign, online play, quick races and training are available.

item.title: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing 3
item.description: Game Description In The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing 3 you have the opportunity to play as a pirate online with a friend for free, together explore the dark locations of Borgovia via the Internet online. The online game Van Helsing 3 allows you to play through the story campaign together. You can participate in confrontations, fighting with players from all over the world. There are 6 classes available to choose from.

item.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
item.description: Game Description The legendary third-person slasher series - The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt, which tells us the story of Geralt of Rivia, who becomes one of the few characters in the central series of action-packed books. We start the game remembering the events of the second part. But let’s not talk about them. Our hero is a born killer, capable of killing and ending the lives of thieves, criminals, assassins, kings, leaders, generals and monsters living throughout the map.

item.title: Project CARS
item.description: Game Description Project CARS is a car simulator that allows you to play online with a friend, as well as compete with other players online online. You can use the Pirate to participate in local competitions or take part in championships, competing with the best racers from all over the world. The project includes all modes, tracks, tournaments, cars and add-ons for free. The main emphasis is on realistic physics and individual behavior of each car.

item.title: Kerbal Space Program
item.description: Game Description Kerbal Space Program is a space sim designed for solo exploration of the universe or a shared campaign through the Internet online. The Kerbal Space Program allows pirates to play for free online with a friend, exploring a fictional solar planetary system. It consists of five large and two dwarf planets. The main action takes place on the continent of Kerbal. The inhabitants of this planet are little green men.

item.title: Kerbal Space Program
item.description: Game Description In the space simulator Kerbal Space Program the player will lead the Kerbal race exploring the vastness of space. Be the one who guides them towards a brighter future, inventing new technologies, constructing many new mechanisms and helping in the exploration of the galaxy. Start your journey in one of three modes. In “Career” you will need to monitor the education and training of your charges, as well as help in modernizing their devices.

item.title: Son of Nor
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Son of Nor you can play online with a friend for free, competing on the Internet online in various multiplayer modes. A special feature of the gameplay is the ability to terraform. You can change the environment using different abilities. The online game allows participants to use telekinetic skills, subjugating the entire dynamic environment of the locations. All players take on the role of the Sons of Nora.

item.title: Verdun
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Verdun you can play online for free with a friend on the pirate, together taking part in realistic combat operations from the First World War. On the Internet online you can play in co-op or fight with each other. Verdun takes place from 1914 to 1918. The main events take place in Verdun in 1916. The possibility of free online play allows you to fight in modes such as Frontline, Attrition, Deathmatch and Squad Defense.

item.title: Dungeons 2
item.description: Game Description On pirate Dungeons 2 you can play online for free, competing with a friend or other players online online.
