The gameplay is a strategy game with RPG elements, filled with a lot of humor and various multiplayer content. Mechanics contain management. it is necessary to manage troops and resources. Multiplayer Dungeons 2 allows you to traverse dungeons in co-op or fight in versus battles. The main antagonist and, at the same time, hero is the Dungeon Lord.

item.title: Crypt of the NecroDancer
item.description: Game Description Crypt of the NecroDancer is a hybrid of a rhythm game and a simplified roguelike. It has a single player mode and multiplayer, which is available online online. You can also play Pirate with a friend online. The indie project uses 2D pixel graphics and a top-down view. The title is made in a fantasy setting. The product “Crypt of the Necrodancer” has atypical gameplay. In one turn, you can move a character, use an item, strike, and so on.

item.title: Grand Theft Auto 5
item.description: Game Description GTA 5 has received dozens of awards for its open world, and almost the most expensive multi-platform project in history is Grand Theft Auto V. The story opens before us in the same fictional state - San Andreas, made 1 to 1 as Southern California. We play as three robber friends who have spent their entire adult lives stealing cars, robbing small shops and people on the street. One day someone decides to get involved in organized crime, which they have been fighting for the last 5 years.

item.title: Mortal Kombat X
item.description: Game Description Mortal Kombat X is a fighting game that allows you to play online with a friend on a pirate or fight for free with other players online. You can fight together on a shared screen in versus mode. Free online play features include several classic tower challenge matches, as well as Clan Feuds, where players choose the faction they fight for. At the end of the week, the best clan with the most victories is determined.

item.title: Square Heroes
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Square Heroes you can play online for free, fighting with a friend or a whole group of players. Intense tournaments are presented, available online online or in single player mode, where one player fights against artificial intelligence. The online game is built around the Galactic Tournament. Having chosen your hero, you need to open a wide range of weapons and upgrade the hero’s abilities. You can fight with friends locally.

item.title: Running With Rifles
item.description: Game Description Running With Rifles is a tactical shooter that allows you to compete online for free on a pirate or play online with a friend, fighting in co-op mode against a common enemy. Network play supports cross-platform. The gameplay is an isometric action game with RPG elements. Each participant plays the role of an ordinary soldier, carrying out orders to destroy enemy troops or defending their lands from terrorists.

item.title: Dark Souls 2: Scholar of the First Sin
item.description: Game Description DARK SOULS 2: Scholar of the First Sin takes the dark atmosphere and addictive gameplay to a whole new level of quality. As before, you, in the role of a wandering soul, have to wander through a dark and mysterious world, use tactics during battle even with simple opponents, and always remain on guard, since danger comes from everywhere - these are the rules of this eerie world.

item.title: Elite Dangerous
item.description: Game Description Elite Dangerous is an online multiplayer game, the third part of the “Elite” franchise, which began in 1984. The player is given complete freedom to explore and travel, and has the opportunity to influence the storyline. The action takes place thousands of years later in the distant future on the territory of several million star galaxies. Most of the stars, planets, asteroids and other cosmic bodies that exist in the real world.

item.title: Nightside
item.description: Game Description In the Nightside strategy, you can play online with a friend, fighting with each other, or in co-op for free on a pirate. You can go through the story on one device or compete online online. You can take control of four unique races. Each fights with an individual type of weapon, units, uses its own battle tactics and much more. The gameplay of Nightside develops in real time.

item.title: War For The Overworld
item.description: Game Description The pirate version of War For The Overworld allows you to play online with a friend for free, teaming up to explore dark dungeons. Using the Internet online, you can set up your own lair, hire minions and launch an attack on the enemy base. The gameplay is built on classic RTS mechanics, adding elements of role-playing adventure. The action takes place in gloomy dungeons filled with dangerous crypts, traps, obstacles and numerous enemies.

item.title: Bloodsports.TV
item.description: Game Description Bloodsports.TV is a dynamic MOBA aimed at playing online with a friend or random players from all over the world. You can play the pirate game online for free or fight alone with bots. The action takes place in post-apocalyptic Sweden. The online game places players in the territory of a missile base, where they must protect developments from criminals and bloodthirsty monsters. The project is a spin-off of Hero Defense.

item.title: theHunter: Primal
item.description: Game Description theHunter: Primal is an open-world survival game that you can play online with a friend to fight bloodthirsty dinosaurs for free on a pirate. You can survive on the Internet online with random players or play in solo mode. Each participant takes on the role of a Trailblazer. The action takes place on the planet Primal Eden. TheHunter: Primal online game allows you to explore a huge area of ​​24 square kilometers.

item.title: Ethereum
item.description: Game Description Etherium is a real-time strategy game that offers you to fight online over the Internet for one of three empires fighting for the valuable resource Etherium. For free, you can play pirate online with a friend, joining forces against common enemies or fighting in intense confrontations. Etherium is a rare resource that has been discovered on several planets. It gives unlimited possibilities to its owners. The possibility of free online play includes base development, control of infantry, tanks and air forces.

item.title: Battlefield Hardline
item.description: Game Description Battlefield Hardline gives you the opportunity to compete online online, participating in various multiplayer modes. For free, you can play pirate online with a friend or enter into confrontations with random people from all over the world. The Battlefield Hardline network game is represented by such disciplines as Hijacking, Blood Money, Robbery, Capture and Team Fight. The additions are Crime, Robbery, Darkness, Escape and Betrayal. The gameplay is a tactical first-person shooter.

item.title: Zombie Kill of the Week - Reborn
item.description: Game Description Zombie Kill of the Week - Reborn is a dynamic zombie shooter with platformer elements that you can play online on a pirate for free with a friend. The gameplay allows you to go through the campaign either alone or join forces with a partner online. Finding yourself in the vastness of a post-apocalyptic world, you need to survive at any cost. A wide arsenal of firearms is presented.

item.title: Chicken Invaders 5 COTDS
item.description: Game Description Chicken Invaders 5 COTDS is the fifth episode of the franchise of the same name, which introduces the opportunity to play online with a friend using an online Internet connection. Local co-op and versus mode are available for free on Pirate. The main missions are tasks to find artifacts. Online play in Chicken Invaders: Cluck of the Dark Side allows participants to join forces to search for important objects on various planets.

item.title: Cities: Skylines
item.description: Game Description The city-planning simulator - Cities: Skylines - is in the best traditions of the real game, in which its own physical laws were created to transfer them into gaming reality. On the territory of your new city, it will be taken into account that the profile road is built in one way, and the road at the airport - in another. It will count if you correctly lay the pipeline for the heating system, and also if you can show people that they live in a real paradise, and not just a metropolis where they want to buy them at the expense of shopping centers.

item.title: Zombie Army Trilogy
item.description: Game Description Zombie Army Trilogy is a multiplayer first-person shooter that you can play online with a friend, or cooperate with players around the world. On the pirate platform, 4 fighters can unite for free by connecting via the Internet online to fight the zombie army of Hitler himself. Events take place in an alternate 1940s, when, after the death of the Fuhrer, his army rose from the graves. Zombie Army: Trilogy not only features free online play, but also allows you to take on the role of all the heroes from the famous zombie franchise Left 4 Dead.

item.title: The King of Fighters 2002: Unlimited Match
item.description: Game Description The King of Fighters 2002: Unlimited Match is a dynamic fighting game in which you can play online with a friend on a pirate. You can participate in various multiplayer modes for free, competing with other players online or participating in local matches. The King of Fighters 2002: Unlimited Match improves on the graphics and mechanics of the ‘98 original. New characters have been added and the balance has been reworked.

item.title: Resident Evil Revelations 2
item.description: Game Description Resident Evil Revelations 2 is a spin-off of the cult survival horror series, the plot of which tells about the adventures of Claire Redfield and Barry Burton. You can play pirated online for free with a friend. Both online play and local multiplayer are available. Biohazard Revelations 2, like its predecessor, is represented by an episodic system. The story consists of 5 chapters. Network play consists of interactions between characters.

item.title: Medieval Engineers
item.description: Game Description Medieval Engineers is an open-world sandbox in which you can play for free online as a pirate with a friend, designing and building various architectural structures. The setting is represented by the medieval world. Openworld can be explored alone or online, teaming up with other players. You have to study new technologies and build fortresses that will help protect you from enemies. It is necessary to extract resources, as well as engage in mining operations in order to replenish warehouses with valuable materials.

item.title: Total War Attila
item.description: Game Description Total War Attila is a turn-based strategy that allows you to play online with a friend, or compete online online with random players from all over the world. On the pirate platform you can fight for free in all multiplayer modes and campaigns. Multiplayer allows you to join teams to take on common enemies. The next part of the Total War includes not only the possibility of free online play, but also offers a story campaign, the events of which develop in 395, when the division of the Roman Empire took place.

item.title: Deathtrap
item.description: Game Description Deathtrap is a tower defense game that allows you to team up with a friend or random players on a pirate for free to play online with characters of three classes: warrior, sorceress and arrow. Each hero differs in tactics and fighting style. Events take place in the world of The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing. On the Internet online you can join teams and compete with factions.

item.title: Dying Light
item.description: Game Description Dying Light allows you to play online for free, exploring the open world with a friend. An online Internet connection is available for playing together. The Dying Light: The Following (Hellraid) project is a first-person action game with survival elements. The hero has parkour skills, which allows him to move through streets and buildings at incredible speed. You can climb onto roofs, show tricks, combine jumps with punches, etc.

item.title: Dying Light
item.description: Game Description A terrible virus grows into a global problem in Dying Light. Starting from the city of Harran in Latin America, the infection is decimating the entire world, turning those infected into the walking dead. The hero must survive in such circumstances and try to correct the situation. As an undercover operative, Kyle Crane receives his most important assignment. He needs to find a guy named Suleiman in order to take away from him an important file that he stole.

item.title: Saints Row: Gat out of Hell
item.description: Game Description In Saints Row: Gat out of Hell you can play online with a friend or compete with random players online online. The gameplay is third-person action in an open world. Online play gives you the opportunity to control familiar characters from the series: Johnny Gat or Kinzie Kensington. The pirated version contains all multiplayer content and includes all add-ons for free. Exploring the demonic version of Steelport requires you to complete main and side missions.

item.title: GRAV
item.description: Game Description GRAV is a sandbox that you can play online with a friend while exploring the vast expanses of space. On the pirate route you can visit various planets for free, traveling across continents alone or with friends online. Each planet is highlighted by biomes and creatures. The gameplay allows you to collect items, build a base, hunt monsters and much more. Multiplayer allows you to both cooperate with other survivors and declare enmity.

item.title: Geometry Dash
item.description: Game Description Geometry Dash is a 2D arcade game aimed at hardcore level completion. You will take control of a unique character, which can be in the form of a geometric figure, to pass the most difficult levels and open up new opportunities in the gameplay. Here you will find more than 100 original and challenging missions, as well as the opportunity to create your own main character and share your results on the leaderboard.

item.title: Assetto Corsa
item.description: Game Description Assetto Corsa is a car simulator developed based on test drives of cars using a model of real behavior. Includes both single player and multiplayer modes. The developers presented a variety of licensed cars and tracks, which were specially digitized specifically for the race to convey maximum authenticity to their prototypes. The machines can be customized to your individual taste, because… the creators have added an extensive set of settings and support for modifications.

item.title: THE KING OF FIGHTERS '98 ULTIMATE MATCH FINAL EDITION
item.description: Game Description THE KING OF FIGHTERS ‘98 ULTIMATE MATCH FINAL EDITION is a dynamic fighting game that gives you the opportunity to play online as a pirate, fighting with a friend or random people online online. KOF 98 includes multiplayer features and all previously released content for free. Multiplayer allows you to fight as legendary fighters such as Eiji Kisaragi, Kasumi Todoh, Geez Howard, Mister Big and Wolfgang Krauser. Alternative versions of fighters are available.

item.title: BlazBlue: Continuum Shift Extend
item.description: Game Description BlazBlue: Continuum Shift Extend is a continuation of a dynamic fighting game made in anime style. You can play online with a friend, fighting for free on a pirate. Local mode and online confrontations are available. The sequel introduces several new modes, various story scenarios, additional heroes, online play and a lot of other content. The story begins after the Second War ended. The Librarium branches were completely wiped out from the face of the earth.

item.title: Lara Croft and The Temple Of Osiris
item.description: Game Description Lara Croft and The Temple Of Osiris is a spin-off of the main Lara Croft series, aimed at online co-op. You can play online with a friend on a pirate, using all the available multiplayer functions of the project. Lara Croft and The Temple Of Osiris is a sequel to the previous game called Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light. Events are developing in Egypt. The Temple of Set, the god of chaos, was discovered.

item.title: Fight The Dragon
item.description: Game Description Fight The Dragon is a Hack and Slash game with RPG elements. You can run around the local expanses on a pirate ship alone or play online with a friend. This can be done together at the same computer or in a small group on the Internet online. The main feature of the project is that it was created by a fan community. This is an isometric and session title.

item.title: Rising World
item.description: Game Description You can play Rising World online online with a friend or other players. All network functions on the pirate version are presented unchanged, so the possibility of free online play is available to all players, regardless of device. You can play online for free both through a local network and over the Internet. Gameplay-wise, the project is a sandbox where events, enemies, loot and dungeons are randomly generated. Once in the world of Rising World, you need to start with the simplest tools.

item.title: Motorcycle Club
item.description: Game Description Motorcycle Club is a racing arcade game with simulator elements, which provides the opportunity to play on a pirate for free online, competing with a friend in a confrontation or online online, playing in a team against other participants. Online play allows you to join teams against other biker groups. The vehicle fleet is represented by 22 brands: BMW, Honda, Kawasaki, KTM, Suzuki, Yamaha, etc. The possibility of free online play allows you to fight in three modes: Superbike, Roadster and Custom.

item.title: The Jackbox Party Pack
item.description: Game Description The Jackbox Party Pack is the first in a series of competitive party games that you can play online for free. Together with a friend or in a company of up to 100 people, participants take part in various types of competitions on the Internet online. You can play from various devices, be it a personal computer, phone, tablet, etc. Online play and single-player competitions are available. The Jackbox Party Pack includes 5 unique types of competitions.

item.title: Geometry Wars 3: Dimensions
item.description: Game Description Geometry Wars 3: Dimensions is a dynamic twin-stick shooter that gives you the opportunity to play online with a friend, competing with each other on a pirate game for free. It is possible to unite online against a common enemy via the Internet. Game mechanics develop the ideas of the previous two parts, improving balance, effects, graphics, etc. An online game designed for two players is presented, and a full-fledged story solo mode is also available.

item.title: Craft The World
item.description: Game Description Craft The World is a sandbox that allows you to play as a pirate for free online with a friend or compete with random participants online online. Mechanics include elements of colony development, crafting and god simulator. It is necessary to explore the generated locations that are inhabited by a variety of creatures. You need to build a base by collecting useful resources and tools. Allows you to build complex structures and create powerful weapons.

item.title: WARMACHINE: Tactics
item.description: Game Description WARMACHINE: Tactics is a turn-based strategy game in which you can play online as a pirate with a friend, fighting for free in versus or co-op mode. Over the Internet, online players will need to enter the battle for the Iron Kingdom, commanding their own army of steam soldiers. In the world of WARMACHINE: Tactics, the world of magic co-exists with high technology. Online play and single player mode available.

item.title: Bloons TD 5
item.description: Game Description Bloons TD 5 is a bright and dynamic tower defense game that allows you to play online with a friend on a pirate for free, competing in the construction of defensive towers online online. There are many different upgrades, specialists and various challenges available in which you need to destroy all enemies who have invaded the protected area. Each building can be improved. To build a base or create an item, monkeys are used, which run around the map and protect the territory from enemies.

item.title: Construction Simulator 2015
item.description: Game Description Construction Simulator 2015 is a builder simulator that offers you, together with a friend or random players, to build an entire city over the Internet online. You can play pirates online for free, or build houses alone. Network play supports cross-platform. The opportunity for free online play includes each participant controlling one of 16 construction vehicles from the LIEBHERR, STILL and MAN brands. Together you will need to dig a pit to create a solid foundation.

item.title: Never Alone
item.description: Game Description Never Alone is an adventure platformer designed to be played online with a friend. You can use the Internet connection online or go through the story locally. All network functions are included for free, and the pirate version also contains all bonus materials and modes. The slogan of which perfectly describes the entire gameplay: I’m not alone. The project is based on an Inupiaq tale called Kunuuksaayuka. You have to control the girl Nuna and her faithful arctic fox.

item.title: This War of Mine
item.description: Game Description This War of Mine is a cross-platform platformer game with elements of survival for an entire group of people. At the beginning of the game, you are given several characters to control the group, and you develop them depending on the time of day. During the day, the characters live in a house located in a city besieged by rebels. They arrange their everyday life, help each other, perform joint tasks and craft the necessary items.

item.title: LEGO Batman 3 Beyond Gotham
item.description: Game Description You can play LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham online with a friend, even on a pirated version and for free. This time, Batman doesn’t just protect Gotham City, but teams up with the entire team of DC Comics superheroes and goes into space! In an online multiplayer game, supervillain Brainiac, who can shrink cities, collects miniature worlds for his bizarre collection. Players can assemble a team of over 150 DC heroes and villains, including familiar faces from the Justice League and even toughs like Cyborg and Solomon Grundy.

item.title: Toybox Turbos
item.description: Game Description Toybox Turbos is an arcade simulator in which you can take part in pirate races online with a friend, competing online for free in various multiplayer modes. The online game allows you to ride in 35 different cars. There are a total of 18 tracks available, made in unique styles. On the tracks, players will find various obstacles and boosters. Boosts include mines, machine guns, hammers and many other types of weapons that help destroy your opponents.

item.title: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
item.description: Game Description The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth is a remake of the game of the same name, which allows you to compete online on the Internet. You can play online with a friend, using all the features of a cooperative game for free on a pirate. The gameplay is in the RPG genre and contains roguelike elements. The re-release has changed the graphic component. The visual style began to resemble 16-bit classics.

item.title: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
item.description: Game Description The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth is a remake of the original title, allowing you to embark on exciting adventures with additional innovations and improved graphics. The game has been optimized, allowing for stable FPS on most devices. The picture looks more colorful, thanks to hand-drawn pixel characters and environments that increase the quality of the visual component. The effects of shots and enemy deaths have become more detailed, creating tangible dynamics on the battlefield.

item.title: Depth
item.description: Game Description Depth is an asymmetrical multiplayer survival game in which you can explore the deep ocean as a pirate for free with a friend, connecting online via the Internet. You can travel alone or play online with partners, exploring the vast seabed in search of treasure. Bloodthirsty sharks pose a huge threat. You need to fight them or avoid them by any means. The possibility of free online play allows you to both fight predators in co-op and take part in underwater confrontations between each other.

item.title: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare
item.description: Game Description Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare allows pirates to play for free online with a friend or offers to take part in multiplayer competitions with random players around the world. You can play online online or fight in local competitions. Call of Duty: Frontline Warfare is a first-person shooter that features both online play and a single-player campaign. The action takes place in the world of the future. The year is 2054.

item.title: Guns N Zombies
item.description: Game Description Guns N Zombies is an isometric zombie shooter. Fans of co-op can play online with a friend, and also on pirate. Co-op play is only available online. You can’t run together on the same computer here. In Guns N Zombies you need to shoot crowds of enemies in limited space. You can also install defensive turrets. Network play also allows you to do this. Events take place in a world where an apocalypse has occurred.

item.title: BlazeRush
item.description: Game Description BlazeRush is an arcade and combat racing game. In them you can fight for first place with computer opponents or compete online with other users on the Internet. On Pirate it is possible to play online with one friend or several friends at once. At the same time, users are allowed to connect at any time to an already ongoing race. The gameplay in BlazeRush is reminiscent of Rock n' Roll Racing.

item.title: Dungeon of the Endless
item.description: Game Description Dungeon of the Endless is a multiplayer roguelike that you can play online with a friend by connecting online via the Internet. A huge variety of characters are available for free on the pirate site, including Josh Ntello, various additional weapons, loot and much more. The gameplay is a strategy game with tower defense and roguelike elements, providing free-to-play online play where the goal of players is to form a team and fend off an attack from a horde of enemies.

item.title: WWE 2K15
item.description: Game Description WWE 2K15 is a wrestling simulator in which you can fight online online or participate in local confrontations with a friend. The pirate version of WWE 2K15 includes all fighters and add-ons from different leagues for free. You can play online as any famous wrestler, including Alberto Del Rio, Edge, Kevin Nash, Kane, Batista, Chris Jericho, John Cena, CM Punk and others. The network game is represented by doubles matches, deathmatches and other competitions.

item.title: Sid Meier's Civilization Beyond Earth
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Sid Meier’s Civilization Beyond Earth you can play online for free with a friend or compete for world domination with other players online online. Sid Meier’s Civilization: Beyond Earth is a global 4X strategy represented by 8 factions: American Resettlement Corporation, Brazil, Franco-Iberia, Cavitan Protectorate, Panzian Cooperative, Polyastria, People’s African and Slavic Unions. Multiplayer allows you to take control of one of the parties to establish dominance in the galaxy.

item.title: Screencheat
item.description: Game Description Screencheat is a multiplayer shooter with a first-person view. You can play it online with a friend on pirate. This can also be done online via the Internet. In total, the project contains 11 maps with many landmarks. Screencheat only offers online play. Compared to other titles, the indie project stands out with its unusual concept. In it, the screen is always divided into several parts. The number of windows depends on the number of participants.

item.title: Door Kickers
item.description: Game Description Door Kickers is a top-down action game with strategy elements that allows you to team up for free with a friend on a pirate ship to play together online, going through the storyline, or to confront other players, competing online on the Internet. Having assembled your special forces squad, you need to confront various terrorist groups and organizations. The gameplay is driven by planning and tactics. It is important to be able to quickly make decisions and analyze the situation.

item.title: F1 2014
item.description: Game Description F1 2014 is a sports car simulator. You can play Pirate online with a friend. This allows you to share it over the Internet online or LAN. Having fun together on one PC is also possible. There is a split screen mode for this. F1 2014 has an official Formula 1 license. The project contains all the tracks, drivers, cars from the 2014 season. Including the Red Bull Ring track in Spielberg, Austria, and the autodrome in Sochi.

item.title: Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel
item.description: Game Description Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel is a first-person shooter that allows you to play online with a friend using an online connection, or go through the story campaign alone. All multiplayer functions are available on the pirate version, making it possible to complete the story part in the company of a partner. Events develop between the first two parts. The game starts from the Vault, and the main actions take place on the satellite of Pandora.

item.title: Rise Son of Rome
item.description: Game Description Ryse Son of Rome is an action game that allows you to team up with a friend to play online as a pirate. All network functions are available for free, as well as the ability to fight online over the Internet. Additionally, the addons Mars Chosen, Duel of Fates and Morituri Pack are presented. The main story centers on Marius Titus, a Roman soldier fighting barbarian invaders. He joins Britain to avenge his family’s death.

item.title: Damned
item.description: Game Description Damned is a first-person co-op horror game with stealth elements. Its gameplay is tailored for short online sessions on the Internet. On Pirate you can play online with a friend or with random users. Each match requires 5 participants. The gameplay here is asymmetrical. The possibility of free online play allows gamers to experience an atypical experience. In Damned, users can take on one of two roles. The goal of the survivors is to escape the level and help their teammates do the same.

item.title: METAL SLUG X
item.description: Game Description METAL SLUG X is considered the second part of a series of Japanese titles in the Run ‘n’ gun genre. The sequel can be played alone or online with a friend, even on a pirated version. In addition to hacking on the Internet online, there is local multiplayer, which allows you to have fun together on one computer. The release contains an improved version. The developers replaced the music in it, partially redid the old locations, increased the number of enemies, added more bonuses and made many minor changes.

item.title: Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor
item.description: Game Description The main character - Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor - will fight Sauron and avenge his family. One day, Sauron kidnapped Talion to sacrifice him and summon Celebrimbor, the spirit of the main elf in the world of the Lord of the Rings. However, this spirit helps Talion to resurrect, gives him new abilities and sends him into battle. The protagonist’s enemies are Sauron and his dark lords: the Hammer, the Black Hand and the Tower.

item.title: Gauntlet
item.description: Game Description Gauntlet is a 3D remake of the arcade classic. The re-release of Slayer Edition allows you to play online with a friend, and this can be done even on a pirated platform. Here you can have fun locally. The co-op is also available online and in Hotseat mode. The project itself is a fantasy action game with a top-down view. In Gauntlet there are 4 characters to choose from: Valkyrie - her name is Tyra, and she can fight with a one-handed blade and throw her shield like a boomerang; Mage - the wizard Merlin, who knows 9 spells and knows how to combine them; Warrior - melee fighter Thor , capable of accelerating attacks and delivering circular strikes; Elf - marksman Questor, who prefers to set traps and fire from a bow.

item.title: Defense Grid 2
item.description: Game Description Defense Grid 2 is a 3D Tower Defense set in a science fiction setting. On this pirate game you can play with a friend over a local network. The cooperative is also available on the Internet online and on one PC on a shared screen. However, it is designed only for two gamers. The possibility of free online play increases the replayability of the project. In Defense Grid 2, the network game contains 3 modes that are not available in the single player.

item.title: Stronghold Crusader 2
item.description: Game Description Stronghold Crusader 2 is a real-time strategy game that you can play online with a friend or fight for free on a pirate battle with random players using an online Internet connection. The possibility of free online play includes managing one of several countries with its own unique army, lord, buildings, etc. The difference from previous games in the series is that online play is the main mode, while training, single player campaign and map editor are secondary modes.

item.title: Endless Legend Emperor Edition
item.description: Game Description Endless Legend Emperor Edition is a strategy game that allows you to play online with a friend and fight online with different people around the world. The pirate version includes online modes and add-ons such as Guardians, Shadows, Shifters, Tempest, Inferno and Symbiosis for free. The action takes place on the continent of Auriga in the far reaches of the galaxy. The project belongs to the same universe as Endless Space.

item.title: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM Revolution
item.description: Game Description NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM Revolution is a fighting game with beat-em-up elements based on the Naruto universe. It offers battles with bots and fights with live opponents over the Internet online. You can also play pirate online with a friend. It also supports a mode where users sit at the same computer and fight on a single screen. NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM Revolution features free online play, a single player campaign, championships, individual competitions, free battles, and training.

item.title: Dead Rising 3
item.description: Game Description Dead Rising 3 is an open-world zombie action game that you can play online with a friend or compete with random players online. The gameplay includes elements of crafting and survival, allowing you to explore an entire city consisting of four districts for free as a pirate. Each area contains unique enemies and a different set of quests. It is necessary to destroy zombies using a variety of available means, including melee weapons and self-crafted tools.

item.title: Sims 4
item.description: Game Description Sims 4 is a life simulator that you can play for free online with a friend or build your life alone. Using an online Internet connection, you can build your family, make friends with your neighbors, and much more. The events take place in a small town, where each house is inhabited by unique Sims leading their own individual lifestyles. Before you start the game, you can create your own character or choose a ready-made one, with your own characteristics and character.

item.title: Lethal League
item.description: Game Description Lethal League is a competitive arcade game with fighting game elements, which provides the opportunity to play online as a pirate for free, fighting with a friend or other players in dynamic duels over the Internet online. The essence of the gameplay is to hit your opponent in the face with an anti-gravity ball. The Lethal League network game allows you to both join forces and perform in cross-matches.

item.title: Metro 2033 Redux
item.description: Game Description Metro 2033 Redux is a first-person shooter with a deep story and horror elements. The developers questioned not the simple existence of people underground, but the relationships between them. Has the main threat always been with us, in people? In the world of the post-apocalypse, we play as a character named Artem. He grew up underground, in the Moscow metro. In 2013, the world was hit by the terrible consequences of the latest epidemic.

item.title: Orbital Gear
item.description: Game Description Orbital Gear is a space shooter designed for playing together with a friend. You can play online as a pirate for free, fighting with battle mechs and traveling through the vastness of space on the Internet online. A very important mechanic is the gravity of celestial objects. By taking control of one of the robots, you can arm your character with 12 different types of weapons. Network play allows you to engage in battle with friends and random people online online.

item.title: Ultra Street Fighter IV: Arcade Edition
item.description: Game Description Ultra Street Fighter IV is a 3D fighting game that can be played as a pirate with a friend online or alone with bots. Both regular matches and rating battles are available online on the Internet. The system tries to select living opponents with approximately the same skill. The Arcade Edition is posted here. It differs from the usual one in the changed balance, the introduction of new movements and settings for old heroes.

item.title: Sacred 3
item.description: Game Description Sacred 3 changed its genre dramatically. Despite the radical changes, the project retained some of the advantages of the series, such as the ability to play online with a friend (this can also be done on a pirate account). Both local battles and those battles that take place over the Internet are supported. Network play allows up to 4 users to have fun at the same time. Despite the possibility of free online play, gamers will not be able to run around the open world together.

item.title: Mount Your Friends
item.description: Game Description In Mount Your Friends you need to team up with a friend to play online, building a human tower of athletes. The humorous pirate game includes all online modes for free. An extreme sport created for real muscular athletes. Using an online Internet connection or a LAN network, you need to build a mountain of half-naked men with these same hanging ones. A real man’s and masculine sport! The gameplay does not contain any sexual innuendo.

item.title: Magic: The Gathering – Duels of the Planeswalkers 2015
item.description: Game Description Magic: The Gathering – Duels of the Planeswalkers 2015 allows you to have fun online online. You can play with a friend online, even on a pirate site. The project belongs to the CCG genre. This is a video game adaptation of the popular card board game. The product is also known as Magic 2015 - Duels of the Planeswalkers. The possibility of free online play allows you to fight with live opponents, and not just with bots.

item.title: Blockscape
item.description: Game Description Blockscape is a sandbox and open-world survival simulator with a first-person view. On a pirate, you can run alone through the local open spaces or play with a friend online. Online multiplayer available. There is a Just build mode, where you can calmly engage in creativity. An indie project dedicated to building blocks. Blockscape’s goal is to start from scratch and build an empire. The possibility of free online play allows two people to achieve the goal.

item.title: Real Boxing
item.description: Game Description Real Boxing can please boxing fans. Those who prefer to fight with live opponents in such projects will be able to play with a friend online on this pirate game. Local locale is not supported, but you can fight together on one PC or online online. The title came to computers from mobile devices. It has adapted touch controls for the keyboard. A gamepad can also be used, but not all controllers are supported.

item.title: ibb and obb
item.description: Game Description The adventure ibb and obb allows you and your friend to play on a pirate ship for free online, interacting with each other. A feature of the gameplay is a funny gravity that works in several directions. Whether online or locally, players need to join forces to overcome all the obstacles and traps. In ibb and obb you will need to solve a huge number of spatial puzzles. The multiplayer mode is aimed at cooperative interaction between participants.

item.title: Tropico 5
item.description: Game Description Tropico 5 can offer not only single-player, but also multiplayer. You can play Pirate with a friend online. But this can only be done online via the Internet. This is a city planning and political simulator, as well as an economic strategy. Tropico 5 covers the period from the 19th to the 21st century. When certain conditions are met, a change in the historical period occurs. There are 4 of them: the colonial era, as well as world wars, cold wars and modern wars.

item.title: Blade Symphony
item.description: Game Description Blade Symphony allows you to play pirate with a friend online, fighting with other users with swords. In addition to battles over the Internet, battles with bots are available online. The indie project itself crosses slasher and fighting games. It uses a third-person view. There is a choice of characters and weapons. The fighting style depends on their combination. The scimitar is suitable for those who like to attack weakly but often, while the rapier is more designed for those who prefer to parry.

item.title: Wargame Red Dragon
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Wargame Red Dragon you can play with a friend online for free, fighting in co-op or against other players. On the Internet online you can unite into teams to confront enemy squads. Network play allows you to collect resources, develop new technologies and destroy your opponent’s bases. The gameplay is aimed at spectacular and dynamic military battles. The possibility of free online play allows you to take control of one of several countries, be it Japan, China, North Korea, South Korea, Australia and New Zealand.

item.title: LEGO The Hobbit
item.description: Game Description In LEGO The Hobbit players can play through the story campaign online, free of charge on a pirate ship, joining forces with a friend to overcome obstacles. You can play online or play on one device. It is also possible to compete with each other online or locally on the Internet. The adventure is based on the Hobbit films of the same name: An Unexpected Journey and The Desolation of Smaug.

item.title: The Elder Scrolls Online
item.description: Game Description The game The Elder Scrolls Online offers you to go through a number of locations for several warring factions, playing both alone and in real time with other players. The plot tells how Molag Bal, known as the Prince of Violence, decides to take over the entire kingdom of Tamriel and enslave ordinary citizens. The gamer will have to face the forces of evil and defeat him. Throughout the game world of The Elder Scrolls Online, there are several factions available, each of which is endowed with certain properties.

item.title: Scourge: Outbreak
item.description: Game Description Scourge: Outbreak invites you to go to the near future to play online with a friend on a pirate in a completely new setting, unlike other projects. The year is 2026, and the world is at the mercy of the Nogari Corporation. They are the creators of a completely new energy source called “Ambrosia”. And there are immediately those in the world who want to get this energy for themselves.

item.title: Call of Duty: Ghosts
item.description: Game Description Call of Duty: Ghosts is a first-person shooter that allows you to play as a pirate for free online with a friend in multiplayer mode or go through the story campaign alone. Call of Duty: Specter is the tenth serialized installment in the franchise. A story-based game for a US Army Special Forces soldier is presented. The action takes place in a world close to the post-apocalypse. A certain hacker hacked the ONE space station and struck key cities in the United States.

item.title: Mercenary Kings
item.description: Game Description Mercenary Kings has the optimal concept for playing online with a friend on a pirate. Here, users become part of the Mercenary Kings squad - the best team to recruit on Earth. But when the partners were defeated and are now being held in a super secret base, the gamer must do everything to stop the enemies. Here, he will be confronted by members of the Claw organization. In addition to the ability to do everything alone, the user is given the option of sharing the game online.

item.title: South Park: The Stick of Truth (game)
item.description: Game Description The funny events of South Park take us into the world of the game South Park: The Stick of Truth, where we play the role of a newcomer who has ambitions and a desire to build a circle of friends in a new city. As soon as we enter the game, famous fourth graders start swinging swords and casting random spells. One of these brings chaos and evil into this world, which we have to cope with.

item.title: Mars Colony: Challenger
item.description: Game Description In addition to the ability to play online with a friend on a pirate, Mars Colony: Challenger immerses gamers in the atmosphere of deep space. Events take place on a space station, which in turn is based on the surface of Mars. Here, players will have to provide themselves with conditions for a comfortable existence by monitoring the condition of equipment, monitoring and growing new samples of food, and also coping with difficulties that arise along the way.

item.title: One Finger Death Punch
item.description: Game Description One finger death punch is an arcade fighting game in the style of beat’em up, in which you can feel like a real martial arts master. In this game we have to fight off crowds of enemies that have surrounded the main character and are advancing from opposite sides. The game design is made in 2D, and all the characters are drawn people, which adds simplicity to the game, but at the same time makes it unusual.

item.title: The LEGO Movie Videogame
item.description: Game Description In The LEGO Movie - Videogame you can play pirate online with a friend for free. In this online multiplayer game you will control characters from the film, such as Emmett, Wyldstyle and Batman. Just like building with real LEGOs, you’ll use building blocks to solve puzzles and complete levels. Here’s the kicker: there are two types of characters. Regular builders, like Emmet at the beginning of the game, need pages of instructions to build things.

item.title: Talisman Digital Edition
item.description: Game Description Talisman Digital Edition provides the opportunity to play online with a friend, competing with each other on a pirate game for free. You can participate in various multiplayer competitions on the Internet online or on a shared screen. The project is a licensed digital version of the board game of the same name. The setting is made in the fantasy genre. The mechanics contain elements of classic board games and strategy games.

item.title: Disciples 3: Reincarnation
item.description: Game Description Disciples III: Reincarnation provides the opportunity to play online for free with a friend over the Internet. It takes players to the Gothic kingdom of Nevendaar, where a celestial creature has abandoned its charges. This expanded version of Disciples III: Renaissance and the Resurrection add-on has been completely redesigned, featuring a redesigned combat engine, new visuals, and a captivating narrative written by fantasy author Ekaterina Stadnikova. Now you can play online with a friend for free, even on a pirate site.

item.title: Octodad Dadliest Catch
item.description: Game Description In Octodad Dadliest Catch players will have to play pirates for free online, controlling Octodads pretending to be people. You can play with a friend locally or compete with random people online online. The gameplay focuses on funny ragdoll and physics. You will need to perform a variety of tasks, destroying objects along the way. Online play includes competition and co-op modes. The action takes place in a huge aquarium.

item.title: Hero Siege
item.description: Game Description Hero Siege is a roguelike with hack-n-slash elements that can be played online on a pirate site for free. You will have to explore the generated locations alone or online. Monsters, loot, bosses, and many other elements are also randomized. The free online game allows you to team up with up to four people to descend into dark dungeons and fight powerful opponents. The single player campaign and online play consist of 7 acts.

item.title: Insurgency
item.description: Game Description Insurgency is a tactical shooter, presented with the ability to play online with a friend or other people online, participating as a pirate for free in various confrontation modes. Mutiny allows you to fight online in cooperative and team matches. The action takes place during the events of the Iranian War. The online game relies on realism and heavy weapon physics. The possibility of free online play allows you to take control of one of two opposing factions: US PMC employees and Iranian rebels.

item.title: Insurgency
item.description: Game Description Insurgency is a first-person shooter, in which the developers focused on playing in cooperative or multiplayer mode, about the Iraq War. The protagonist is a member of the US PMC, and he is fighting against Iraqi insurgents. The player chooses one side at the beginning of the match, and after that a brutal fight begins between the two factions. The basis of the game is a confrontation between two teams, which include 16 people.

item.title: Nidhogg
item.description: Game Description Nidhogg is a game for two that can be played for free online with a friend: on a pirate you can connect via the Internet online or locally. Nidhogg is a 2D action game with elements of a fencing simulator. Taking one of the heroes under your leadership, you will have to perform numerous pirouettes, lunges and acrobatic stunts. No one canceled the clumsy blows. Multiplayer Nidhogg places two fighters in different interactive environments where players must demonstrate their hand-to-hand combat skills.

item.title: 3089 -- Futuristic Action RPG
item.description: Game Description On the pirate 3089 – Futuristic Action RPG you can play online with a friend for free, traveling through a variety of procedurally generated locations. You can play cooperatively or participate in online confrontations over the Internet. The action takes place in the distant future on the planet Hakh. You have to fight with androids, aliens and other enemies. The visual side of 3089 – Futuristic Action RPG is made in a low-poly style.

item.title: Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance
item.description: Game Description Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance is a plot branch from the original universe of the recognized genius Hideo Kojima. The game is in the slasher genre, unlike other Metal Gear projects. The plot is dedicated to the story of the cyber ninja Raiden, the protagonist of the second part. 4 years have passed since the collapse of the evil Sons of Patriots corporation. The military units, given freedom of action, plunged the world into chaos and constant divisions of power zones.

item.title: Kingdom Rush
item.description: Game Description Kingdom Rush is a project in the “tower defense” genre, in the style of the Middle Ages, interspersed with magic, creatures that do not exist in real life, like trolls, and real-time control of heroes with a choice of the direction and course of their attacks. This game received recognition on many platforms and later reached personal computers. The gameplay is standard for the genre, the advantage over other projects is the refined balance and exciting, moderately difficult levels that challenge and force you to change battle tactics and constantly be on the alert.

item.title: The Walking Dead: Season 2
item.description: Game Description The Walking Dead: The Game. Season 2 – the continuation of the “Walking Dead” franchise does not lag behind the first part and begins its story 2 years after the previous events. Now in The Walking Dead: Season Two, the user plays as a 10-year-old girl, Clementine, who is once again trying to find shelter and survive in a mortal world filled with living corpses. Having lost all his old friends, a brave child begins a journey on his own.

item.title: Motor Rock
item.description: Game Description Motor Rock is perfect for playing pirate games online with a friend. Considering the peculiarities of the genre (racing arcade), you can have some good fun here by organizing competitions on the proposed tracks. This is a rethinking of the once classic project, which had the same concept - racing on the tracks to rock music. Here, events take on an intergalactic scale, and every racer dreams of getting to the biggest championship.

item.title: Tiny Brains
item.description: Game Description Tiny Brains allows you to play online, teaming up to solve puzzles and interacting with a friend on the pirate board. Laboratory animals endowed with superpowers and intending to escape from the place in which they are being held come under control. The mad scientist is preparing to implement his plan, but the main characters do not want to be part of this action. Therefore, in order to pass all the prepared tests, they will have to work hard, and gamers, in turn, will have to coordinate their actions online.

item.title: Zombie Tycoon 2: Brainhov's Revenge
item.description: Game Description Zombie Tycoon 2: Brainhov’s Revenge focuses on the confrontation between two sides, so the project is suitable for playing online with a friend on a pirate. Here there is a battle between two evil geniuses - Oliver Tycoon with his army of zombies, or Professor Brainhom, his teacher. He is also capable of controlling an entire army of undead and harnessing their power. In addition to the single-player campaign, there are also online deathmatches, where you can arrange battles online over the Internet.

item.title: Baldur's Gate 2 Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description Baldur’s Gate 2 Enhanced Edition gives users the atmosphere of classic RPG projects and at the same time allows you to play online with a friend on a pirate. Here the adventure continues, which began in part 1. In addition, there are enough additional missions, quests and campaigns that drag on for many hours. A squad of heroes going in search of adventure falls under the control of the user.

item.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes
item.description: Game Description LEGO Marvel Super Heroes allows you to play online with a friend, even on pirates for free. Immerse yourself in an epic story spanning the vast Marvel Universe. Play online online, teaming up with legendary heroes such as Iron Man, Spider-Man and Captain America to stop Loki and his villainous pals from creating a world-destroying super-weapon. This online game offers exciting adventures and unforgettable moments in the company of your favorite characters.

item.title: Deadfall Adventures
item.description: Game Description Deadfall Adventures immerses users in the atmosphere of adventure and allows you to enjoy what is happening with a friend on a pirate ship. The events take place in 1938, and the main character is James Lee Quarterman. Wanting to find an ancient artifact hidden in Egypt, he goes there with an expedition. But after starting the search, it turns out that he is not the only one who wants to get hold of precious things.

item.title: XCOM: Enemy Within
item.description: Game Description XCOM: Enemy Within expands on the original game and still allows for online play. Here, while playing the game with a friend on a pirate, users will have access to new types of weapons, a combat system and a list of previously unavailable features. At the same time, new opponents will appear, who can only be defeated by making the right decisions on the battlefield. The essence of the project has not changed in relation to the original, and users will still have to fight back against hostile aliens, whose troops and formations are scattered throughout the Earth.

item.title: Risk of Rain
item.description: Game Description Risk of Rain is a third-person shooter with roguelike elements, aimed at online competitions on the Internet. You can play online with a friend, acting in co-op against common enemies, or use other multiplayer modes available on the pirate site for free. The events of Risk of Rain take place on an unknown planet, where you have to fight off phantasmagoric creatures. Each monster has its own unique attack and movement patterns.

item.title: Project Zomboid
item.description: Game Description Project Zomboid allows you to play with a friend using an online connection. You can also play online with random people from all over the world, using all the multiplayer features available for free on the pirate site. The setting allows you to plunge into the world of a post-apocalypse, where humanity is under the threat of a deadly zombie virus. A large open world is presented for exploration, which you will have to explore alone, or using the opportunity of a free online game.

item.title: Project Zomboid
item.description: Game Description Project Zomboid is a cross-platform game in which we will have to find a house, equip it, and start surviving in a world where a zombie apocalypse has recently occurred. We are located in Knox County. The latest epidemic infected more than 90% of the district’s residents, and they all became zombies. Difficult conditions will force us to survive, stock up on food, water, weapons and all available supplies in order to simply survive.

item.title: Final Exam
item.description: Game Description Final Exam has the optimal concept for playing pirate online with a friend. The plot tells about 4 characters who were heading to school for a party. However, by coincidence, they find themselves in a ghost town filled with sinister creatures. They crave human flesh, so the heroes should think about how to protect themselves. Working together online on the Internet, gamers will have to make their way through crowds of creatures to get out of this ominous place.

item.title: Sniper Elite: Nazi Zombie Army 2
item.description: Game Description Sniper Elite: Nazi Zombie Army 2 uses the concept of previous projects in the series and provides the opportunity to play online with a friend on a pirate. The Second World War is coming to an end, but the armies of the dead are literally rising from their graves. A team of elite snipers will have to deal with them in order to establish complete control over previously captured territories.

item.title: Battlefield 4
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Battlefield 4 you can play for free with a friend online, taking part in cooperative modes, or compete online with players from all over the world over the Internet. The gameplay of Battlefield 4 is a tactical first-person shooter. The network game of the fourth part features many innovations. For example, VoIP solutions have been improved, and a browser mode has been added, allowing you to monitor the game from above or from a third person.

item.title: Contagion
item.description: Game Description Contagion is a fast-paced zombie shooter that allows you to play online with a friend or fight hordes of the undead alone. On the pirate game, you can team up with up to four people for free, confronting the hordes of the infected. Co-op on a shared screen and online playthroughs are available. Each of the heroes has unique abilities and characteristics. The possibility of free online play includes traveling together through contaminated streets in search of weapons and useful resources.

item.title: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 3 Full Burst
item.description: Game Description In NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 3 Full Burst you can not only arrange single battles, but also play online with a friend on a pirate. Plot-wise, this part continues to tell about the events of the 4th Great War, gradually revealing the plans of the villains and giving way to new characters. So, Itachi and Sasuke will fight Kabuto, and the shinobi alliance will try to stop Madara, who was resurrected to implement an insane plan.

item.title: Truck Racer
item.description: Game Description Truck Racer not only gives you the opportunity to play online with a friend on a pirate, but also gives you a lot of emotions from what is happening on the screen. Here, finding yourself behind the wheel of a massive truck, the user is immersed in the atmosphere of dynamic races on tracks in a variety of settings. In total, there are 48 types of tracks on 10 different landscapes, which is why you have to constantly adapt to circumstances in order to beat your opponents.

item.title: The Wolf Among Us
item.description: Game Description The Wolf Among Us is an episodic graphic novel based on the Fable comics series created by Bill Willingham. The game’s plot acts as a prequel to the main story. The game is divided into 5 episodes, where every decision made by the player has a consequence and affects the overall one. history. The gameplay is point-and-click, but some sections contain action and fights, which are QTE scenes. All the characters presented in the game are heroes of famous fairy tales, who, with the help of spells, can exist in the world of people or “Simps”, as they are called here.

item.title: Gas Guzzlers Extreme
item.description: Game Description In Gas Guzzlers Extreme users can feel all the dynamics and drive together, because the project provides the opportunity to play online with a friend on a pirate game. The essence is very simple - each player is given a vehicle equipped with weapons of varying weight. Using all its power, gamers compete with each other on the proposed tracks, finding out who will be the best in a particular race.

item.title: F1 2013
item.description: Game Description Pirate F1 2013 offers the opportunity to play for free with a friend online, competing on Pirate in various multiplayer modes. Co-op is available online on the Internet, which allows you to join a team and compete against other players from around the world. The gameplay of F1 2013 is based on the 13th year of the Formula 1 championship. Free online play features classic content, allowing you to get behind the wheel of some of the most iconic racing cars of the 80s and 90s.

item.title: The King Of Fighters 13
item.description: Game Description The King Of Fighters 13 is a dynamic fighting game aimed at fighting with a friend or random players online online. All multiplayer modes are available for free on the pirate site. You can play online or fight locally. The 13th part of the series has improved balance, removed the least interesting modes, added new competitions, online play and many additional fighters. The plot part directly continues the plot of the 11th game and completes the story of Ash Crimson.

item.title: ARMA 3
item.description: Game Description For free on the pirated version of ARMA 3, you can play online with a friend, joining forces or participating in online confrontations over the Internet. The action takes place on the islands of Altis, Stratis, Tanoa and Malden. There are about 50 different villages on them. Buildings can be destroyed and captured. Events take place in 2030. Western Europe is in crisis, the US and China are fighting, and the CSAT alliance is gaining strength.

item.title: Arma 3
item.description: Game Description In Arma 3 we regain our independence by playing as a neutral side of this war. Inside the universe of the third Arma - 2030. Key opponents are still fighting for independence in economic and commodity terms. Among the enemies, a new structural organization CSAT appears, acting as a military-political alliance. While the crisis rages in Europe, the United States is at odds with China in the Pacific.

item.title: 100% Orange Juice
item.description: Game Description 100% Orange Juice provides a unique opportunity to play online with a friend in an online game for free using a pirated game. Gamers can enjoy exciting online battles online using the free online gaming feature. This game brings together characters from various Orange Juice games, creating a vibrant world where humans, dogs and machines coexist. As young hero Kai, guided by the enigmatic Marie Poppo, gamers travel through multiple realms, facing a menacing darkness that adds intrigue to the gameplay.

item.title: Outlast (+Whistleblower)
item.description: Game Description Outlast (+Whistleblower) - DLC for the game of the same name, which added more content and a new storyline. The addition contains a backstory of the events that happened in the original, where Miles Upshur played the game. The journalist went to the Mount Massive mental hospital, where, for information received, there were many violations. Here he encountered a crowd of terrible psychos - monsters who had taken over the hospital.

item.title: Total War Rome 2 Emperor Edition
item.description: Game Description In Total War Rome 2 Emperor Edition you can play online for free, fighting on a pirate with a friend or other participants both locally and online online. It is allowed to unite into teams to confront each other factions. The online game Total War: Rome 2 is aimed at politics. The intrigues of the rulers play an important role. The map includes 183 regions. Land, sea and siege battles are represented by several stages of battle.

item.title: Total War: ROME 2 - Emperor Edition
item.description: Game Description In Total War: ROME 2 - Emperor Edition we are allowed to play as one of Caesar’s three followers. This is Octavian, the adopted son of a former ruler who is obliged to become the ruler of Rome; Mark Antony is Caesar’s loyal friend and best military leader; and Lepidus, the man through whom Caesar achieved universal recognition. After Caesar was killed, chaos erupted within the Roman Empire. The foreign policy of the empire maintained proper balance, while civil war was taking place inside, and the territory was divided into three parts.

item.title: Rayman Legends
item.description: Game Description Playing Rayman Legends online as a pirate with a friend, alone or with other players online is all the fun and mayhem imaginable! The gameplay is a rich platformer where you need to unlock characters, skins and various accessories, but not entirely for free, but by receiving victory points. The adventure directly continues the previous part of Rayman Origins. The online game Rayman Legends allows you to both compete against each other and take tests in co-op with up to 5 people.

item.title: Game Dev Tycoon
item.description: Game Description Game Dev Tycoon gives gamers the opportunity to become video game developers. Moreover, on the pirate platform they are allowed to play an economic simulator online with a friend. Thanks to the efforts of fans, this can be done online online. The campaign starts in the 1980s. Network play in Game Dev Tycoon offers users competition. In multiplayer, players compete with each other, deliberately pirate other people’s releases, spy and steal data.

item.title: Lost Planet 3
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Lost Planet 3 you can compete with a friend or go through the story campaign together for free. You can play online or fight locally, competing in various multiplayer modes. You can complete the story both online and alone. Despite the three in the title, the story acts as a prequel to the second part and Extreme Condition. Events take place on the snowy planet E.

item.title: Saints Row 4
item.description: Game Description Saints Row 4 is a crazy third-person action game that allows you to play online with a friend for free as a pirate. Online multiplayer competitions are available. The action takes place in a simulation of Steelport. The saints reach a new level, becoming leaders of the state, and the protagonist sits in the chair of the president. However, the Earth is attacked by aliens led by the evil Zinyak.

item.title: Skullgirls 2nd Encore
item.description: Game Description In Skullgirls 2nd Encore you can play online with a friend on a pirate, fighting online online or competing on the same PC. The definitive second edition includes all the extras and heroines, of which there are 14, for free. A single story mode, training, challenges and the possibility of free online play for two or championships with random people from all over the world are presented. Events take place in the bright and unusual world of Dark Deco.

item.title: Sir You Are Being Hunted
item.description: Game Description Sir, You Are Being Hunted is a first-person survival game designed for cooperative play with a friend or giving the opportunity to play online with random participants. On the pirate Sir You Are Being Hunted, you can fight for free in different network modes by connecting online via the Internet. The setting is designed in an aristocratic steampunk style. Sir, You Are Being Hunted gives you complete freedom of action, offering you to explore a huge sandbox world where you will need to use stealth skills and shoot accurately.

item.title: Space Hulk
item.description: Game Description Space Hulk is a co-op action game set in the Warhammer 40,000 universe. You can play the pirate Space Hulk online with a friend, going through the story campaign online for free. The main characters are the Space Marines. Network play allows each participant to take control of one of the warriors in order to go to various gloomy locations where they will need to destroy crowds of monsters.

item.title: Worms Clan Wars
item.description: Game Description On the pirate version of Worms Clan Wars you can play online for free with a friend or fight both locally and online with other players. The Worms network game includes a huge number of worms, many unique landscapes, detailed locations, a wide selection of weapons, an expanded personalization menu and much other content. The possibility of free online play in Worms Clan Wars allows you to assemble your own team of worms: you can name clans, develop a unique emblem, distribute titles to squad members, determine leaders by general voting, and much more.

item.title: Europa Universalis 4
item.description: Game Description In Europa Universalis 4 you can play online with a friend, and also fight online with random people on the Internet, using all the multiplayer features on the pirate for free. The gameplay is a global strategy, the events of which start from the late Middle Ages and end with the Modern Age. The online game allows you to take part in the Battle of Varna and witness the death of Napoleon.

item.title: Europa Universalis 4
item.description: Game Description A new part of the real-time strategy Europa Universalis 4, the multiplayer mode of which allows up to 32 people to play on one server. Based on the previous parts, we can say that there are no more spies in the game, since they upset the overall balance of the game. The magistrate system has also changed greatly as the city’s development has undergone significant changes. The trading system has improved the most.

item.title: Hammerwatch
item.description: Game Description The top-down adventure Hammerwatch gives you the opportunity to join forces with a friend or random people online for free on a pirate. You can play online or use local co-op, going through the storyline on one device. Alone or using the free online play option, you need to destroy hordes of monsters over the course of four chapters. Each environment contains unique biomes, traps, secrets, puzzles and enemies.

item.title: PayDay 2
item.description: Game Description PayDay 2 is a first-person cooperative action game aimed at playing together with a friend. You can play pirate for free online or play in a team with other participants online online. The project is a robbery simulator. Network play allows four players to join forces, where each will take on a specific role in the team. Using the opportunity of a free online game, the server owner selects a task.

item.title: PayDay 2
item.description: Game Description Re-join the PayDay 2 gang as Dallas, Hoxton, Chains or Wolfe, who have come to Washington to rob and make a lot of money. Put the mask on your favorite hero and set off to carry out your next crime, in which you will need to overcome many obstacles before reaching your goal. Now you will have a wide variety of contracts to choose from, from which you can choose any one.

item.title: Papers, Please
item.description: Game Description The fictional country of Arstotzka is a small world of the game’s protagonist, where he will check documents at customs every day. The plot of Papers, Please - a puzzle game with an unusual approach and graphics, as well as the beginning of the simulator - shows the events with the main character winning the profession of a customs officer at a checkpoint in the lottery. His task will be to check documents and apply stamps.

item.title: Spelunky
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Spelunky you can play online with a friend, completing the story campaign for free or competing in procedurally generated locations. A cooperative playthrough is available online on the Internet, in which players take on the role of adventurers. They must explore various dungeons, collecting treasures and rescuing damsels in distress. The main goal is to collect as much gold as possible. It is very important to prevent the death of the protagonist by any means, otherwise you will need to start all over again.

item.title: Divinity: Dragon Commander
item.description: Game Description Divinity: Dragon Commander is a fantasy strategy designed for cooperative play on the Internet online, or confrontation. You are allowed to play online for free on a pirate with a friend, fighting together against other participants or competing with each other. A single player campaign and online play are presented. The gameplay combines elements of real-time strategy and TBS mechanics. Depending on the actions performed, the gameplay switches to different control modes.

item.title: Skulls of the Shogun
item.description: Game Description Skulls of the Shogun is an arcade strategy game that you can play online with a friend for free, fighting on a pirate ship against other dead shoguns. Players choose their fighter to fight each other over the Internet online. Local battles available. The gameplay invites you to engage in battle in turn-based battles. There is a limited turn time, so you need to perform actions as quickly as possible.

item.title: Don't Starve
item.description: Game Description Don’t Starve is an adventure arcade game in the action strategy genre with crafting elements. This game is an interesting survival simulator with a complete open game world. The plot tells us about the main character who was sailing on a ship and was shipwrecked. He woke up on an abandoned island. You will travel a lot through beautiful locations that were drawn by hand. Let’s begin to explore previously unknown living creatures and the remains of bygone times.

item.title: Monaco What's Yours Is Mine
item.description: Game Description Monaco What’s Yours Is Mine is a cooperative heist game that allows you to compete online, play with bots or with a friend. You can gather your own team of thieves to play pirates online against a team of opponents. While one opposing party is trying to hack all the devices in the location in order to get treasures and loot, the second group is trying to track down the criminals.

item.title: God Mode
item.description: Game Description God Mode is a cooperative shooter and action game that allows you to play with a friend online (including on a pirate). Gamers can jointly destroy monsters online online. The project uses a third-person view. In this case, the camera hangs over the character’s shoulder. God Mode emulates old school jokesters. Here you need to shoot crowds of enemies in arena locations. An individual or a group of users will not be allowed to proceed further until all opponents are destroyed.

item.title: Sacred Citadel
item.description: Game Description Sacred Citadel is a spin-off of the series of the same name, made in beat-em-up style. On the pirate Sacred Citadel, you can play online for free with a friend, going through the story campaign in co-op. You can walk through it on one screen and connect via the Internet online. Events take place in the world of Ancaria. It is necessary to join the fight against the Ash Empire, fighting the Grimmock orcs, seraphs and other minions for.

item.title: Age of Empires 2
item.description: Game Description Age of Empires 2 is a real-time strategy that allows you to play online with a friend, organizing battles with the participation of a huge number of troops. An online Internet connection is available on the pirate site. All addons and additions are included for free. Age of Empires 2: Age of Kings tells about events developing during the Middle Ages. The plot begins with the fall of the Roman Empire and ends with the Renaissance.

item.title: Age of Empires 2
item.description: Game Description Age of Empires 2 is a re-release of the classic real-time strategy game with many different improvements. Many years later, this game still remains unique and serves as an example for many strategy developers to follow. In the game, the player will have to take control of a small settlement of a certain faction and lead it to victory and prosperity. Events take place in the Middle Ages, roughly starting from the fall of the Roman Empire and up to the Renaissance.

item.title: Ms Splosion Man
item.description: Game Description Ms Splosion Man is a platformer that gives you the opportunity to play online online, cooperating with a friend on a pirate game. You can go through the campaign alone or play online for free, competing with each other or overcoming numerous obstacles together. The gameplay stands out for its total madness and vibrant visual style. The second player takes on the character from the original game - Solid Man, while the main character of the sequel is his female version.

item.title: Cities in Motion 2: The Modern Days
item.description: Game Description Cities in Motion 2: The Modern Days provides the opportunity to play for free as a pirate online with a friend, competing online on the Internet, or developing transport routes alone. The main difference between City in Movement 2 compared to the original is the network game, which is absent in the original simulator.
