The gameplay allows you to plan routes, build transport junctions, manage networks, create schedules, etc.

item.title: BioShock Infinite
item.description: Game Description BioShock Infinite is a first-person shooter with multiple mechanics of a role-playing adventure in the style of science fiction and steampunk. The game will take place in 1912 in an alternative universe, in the flying city of the United States of America - Columbia. You need to control the private detective Booker Devitt, who has a task to find a cute girl named Elizabeth. Immediately after it is found, the main characters find themselves in the very epicenter of the war.

item.title: Resident Evil 6
item.description: Game Description The pirate version of Resident Evil 6 has 4 unique campaigns available that you can play for free online with a friend. The joint line can be accessed online via the Internet. Events take place 15 years after the destruction of Raccoon City. The online game offers scenarios such as Leon and Helena, Chris and Pierce, Jake and Sherry, as well as Ada Wong and the nameless mercenary. Each storyline will introduce you to new heroes and opponents.

item.title: Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2
item.description: Game Description Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2 offers free online pirate play alone or with a friend. Co-op mode is only available with AI, but versus matches can be played online online. Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2 gives you the opportunity to take on players around the world. Not only is there online play, but also a single-player mode that tells the story of Cole Anderson. He is a private security consultant for the Delta Force Sniper organization.

item.title: The Showdown Effect
item.description: Game Description On the pirate The Showdown Effect you can play online for free, competing with a friend or random participants from all over the world online online. Previously, the project was called Project JFK. The gameplay is 2.5D action, reminiscent of the action films of the 80s and 90s. Multiplayer allows you to choose one of eight characters. Each of the heroes has its own unique abilities. The protagonists represent different countries.

item.title: Tomb Raider
item.description: Game Description Tomb Raider tells about the adventures of the iconic heroine Lara Croft. The protagonist is a tomb raider and an experienced archaeologist. The pirate site offers the opportunity to play online with a friend for free. Online confrontations are available on the Internet in different multiplayer modes. The project is a restart of the franchise. Gameplay consists of exploring vast locations, fighting enemies and solving puzzles. It takes up to 15 hours of real time to complete the story campaign.

item.title: Tomb Raider
item.description: Game Description Tomb Raider is a restart of the series telling about the adventures of Lara Croft. The ship on which the girl’s crew was sailing was wrecked. On the island she is captured and left tied in a cave. The adventurer frees herself from her bonds and goes to look for the crew members. The player can choose the difficulty, which affects the course of battles. A vast world opens up before the gamer, divided into several locations.

item.title: Sniper Elite: Nazi Zombie Army
item.description: Game Description The pirate version of Sniper Elite: Nazi Zombie Army allows you to play online with a friend, fighting for free in various multiplayer modes. The network game is available online online. The cooperative is designed for four people. The opportunity to play free online games includes playing 5 unique missions together. In co-op mode, the kill cam is disabled and zombie dismemberment is slightly reduced. The gameplay is a first-person shooter that tells an alternate history of World War II.

item.title: Brutal Legend
item.description: Game Description In addition to the ability to play online with a friend on a pirate, Brutal Legend takes the user into an open world where its own special atmosphere is created. It combines demonic worlds, a dynamic combat system and heavy rock. The last aspect is realized through the main character, who is one of the best organizers of rock concerts. At one point, after a strange incident on the eve of the show, he finds himself in a parallel world, where he encounters demonic creatures.

item.title: Dead Space 3
item.description: Game Description Dead Space 3 is a continuation of the sci-fi horror game, which you can play online with a friend for free on a pirate account, going through the story campaign together on the Internet online. Cooperative playthrough is the main difference between the third part and its predecessors. Dead Space 3 allows for interaction between participants, unlocks the ability to crouch, and allows you to hide behind cover. Network play, due to cooperative mechanics, increases the intensity and dynamics of shootings several times.

item.title: Sonic and All-Stars Racing Transformed Collection
item.description: Game Description Sonic and All Stars Racing Transformed Collection is a racing arcade game in the Sonic setting, allowing you to play online with a friend or random participants, competing in a variety of multiplayer modes. All 33 characters are available for free on Pirate. The heroes represent both the franchise of the same name and characters from other franchises, such as Shinobi, Football Manager, Shenmue, Total War: Rome II, etc.

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.description: Game Description The first-person shooter - Far Cry 3 - will teach you how to survive in the wild conditions of the open world, more or less value relationships with good people, and show you what real madness is. The series rewarded us with enough action, showing that a huge arsenal of weapons is just part of what can be given to players in return for their desire to enjoy a completely open world and a good story.

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Far Cry 3 you can play online for free with a friend, taking part online in competitive and cooperative modes. Not only is there the possibility of free online play, but also a single-player campaign for Jason Brody. He is an American who was captured by the mad pirate Vaas Montenegro. He needs to escape from the tropical island and find his friends. Far Land 3 multiplayer includes the following modes: Reviving - you can revive your partners; Battlecry - allies receive additional boosts when activating the ability; Scouting - battle with a minimap on which enemies are displayed; Psyche Gas - competitions using gas and friend fire; Battle Bomb - an opportunity to carry out an airstrike; End of Match Scenes - a confrontation in which you can open the final scene.

item.title: Super Hexagon
item.description: Game Description Super Hexagon does not contain any plot. This is a dynamic arcade game with a top view. From the outside it looks like an endless game. But in fact, it can be passed. It will not be easy to reach the end, since the title is very hardcore. The project uses a minimalistic visual style. The gameplay is about survival in the arena. In Super Hexagon it is hexagonal in shape.

item.title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 2
item.description: Game Description On the pirated version of Call Of Duty: Black Ops 2 you can play online for free with a friend, competing in various multiplayer modes online online. The multiplayer game features confrontations in the world of the future. The year is 2025, so multiplayer allows you to use a variety of advanced and futuristic weapons. Each participant can choose the firing mode for their weapon: single shots, short or long bursts.

item.title: Emergency 2013
item.description: Game Description Emergency 2013 is a rescue simulator that offers the opportunity to play online with a friend, using the free co-op option on a pirate. The online confrontation mode is available on the Internet. Allows you to take control of the command of paramedics, fire brigade, police and rescuers. Each faction has its own unique tasks, units, equipment, tools and much more. Network play allows you, together with your partners, to eliminate various emergencies and natural disasters.

item.title: Painkiller: Hell and Damnation
item.description: Game Description Painkiller: Hell and Damnation is presented with the opportunity to play online with a friend, fighting on a pirate for free in duel matches, or online online participating in confrontations with players around the world. Single player campaign and online play available. Events take place after the end of the Overdose expansion. The main character of the adventure is Daniel Garner. He is the simultaneous embodiment of the Gifts of Light and the Curse of Darkness.

item.title: Natural Selection 2
item.description: Game Description Natural Selection 2 is a first-person shooter with strategy elements that allows you to play as a pirate for free online with a friend, going through a story campaign together online on the Internet or fighting in a confrontation. Before starting the adventure, you can undergo training that introduces you to the basics and mechanics of the game. After the tutorial, both online play and a story campaign are available.

item.title: Hotline Miami
item.description: Game Description Hotline Miami is a 2D top-down action game created by two incredibly hardworking and talented young people under the auspices of the same computer game development studio - Dennaton Games. The international release of this project took place in October 2012. The developers admitted that they took their inspiration from the Hollywood crime action films of the 80s. The game, as the name implies, takes place in the city of Miami, in the first half of the 80s.

item.title: Euro Truck Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description You can play Euro Truck Simulator 2 online with a friend, alone, or with random people online online. The pirate version offers Speed ​​Mode and Simulation for free. Each of them has its own characteristics and subtleties in driving a truck. The truck driver simulator allows you to transport numerous cargoes on the roads of Great Britain, Belgium, Germany, Italy, the Netherlands and Poland. The gameplay has a huge emphasis on realistic driving: driving onto the main road, signaling with headlights, allowing other cars to pass, participating in traffic jams, reducing speed due to the provided road signs, etc.

item.title: Euro Truck Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description The basis of Euro Truck Simulator 2 is permanent contracts that will be stolen from under your nose by more experienced players controlled by artificial intelligence. Long routes to the capital of Germany, the Netherlands, England, France and Belgium are your main route when traveling with dangerous or simply expensive cargo. The main task of the driver is to deliver on time, deliver in good condition and not get caught with a fine.

item.title: Rocketbirds: Hardboiled Chicken
item.description: Game Description On the pirate game Rocketbirds: Hardboiled Chicken you can play online with a friend for free, competing with each other in confrontation modes or online online, going through the story campaign together. The main characters are anthropomorphic creatures. Single player campaign, online play and co-op are available. The plot suggests that the warbirds end the power of the penguin. Evil creatures have created a real dictatorship. Key mechanics and features: single and co-op play; rescuing the general’s daughter; destroying countless penguins; 15-chapter campaign; a huge number of weapons and puzzles; co-op mode with 10 missions; 6 feathered heroes with their own characteristics; many mini- stories and cinematic cutscenes; soundtrack from New World Revolution.

item.title: XCOM: Enemy Unknown
item.description: Game Description XCOM: Enemy Unknown is a classic of its genre and is great for playing online with a friend as a pirate. According to the plot, the Earth has been subjected to an alien invasion, and different parts of the planet are captured by enemies. To counter the threat, an elite squad from the XCOM organization falls under the control of users. The fighters of this unit are equipped with the latest types of weapons and uniforms, due to which they can give a worthy rebuff to enemies.

item.title: Worms Revolution
item.description: Game Description Worms Revolution - turn-based strategy with the ability to compete online on the Internet. You can play pirate online with a friend in co-op or fight on interactive maps in a confrontation. All network modes, guns, equipment, characters and locations are provided for free. The gameplay is a two-dimensional platformer where battle worms fight among themselves. Maps are susceptible to terraforming, as the explosion leaves craters and depressions. Using the opportunity of free online play, you can confront a common enemy or compete in duel matches.

item.title: Castle Crashers
item.description: Game Description In Castle Crashers you can play online with a friend, going through the story campaign together, or you can overcome various challenges online online. The gameplay is a two-dimensional beat-em-up, which centers on brave knights trying to resist an evil sorcerer. The pirate site offers a wide selection of weapons and a huge list of spells for free. Multiplayer features dynamic difficulty, increasing the strength and aggressiveness of enemies with each new level.

item.title: Castle Crashers
item.description: Game Description Castle Crashers is an arcade action game in which players will take control of powerful characters and fight monsters. Create a squad by choosing from 25 characters to fight your way through castles against your enemies. Compete with other users or monsters living throughout the continent. The plot will unfold at a ball in the king’s castle. During the fun, an evil sorcerer stole a precious magic stone and four princesses, who must be rescued by the knights and fight the enemy.

item.title: Borderlands 2
item.description: Game Description Borderlands 2 can be played online with a friend in splitscreen mode. Using an Internet connection online, a co-op for four is available for free on the pirate site. The gameplay is presented as a first-person shooter, aimed at looting and leveling up. There are 6 characters to choose from. Everyone has a personal skill set, personality, and background. Once in the open world, you need to go to the notice board to get to work.

item.title: Borderlands 2
item.description: Game Description Borderlands 2 is a shooter with a view from the perspective of the protagonist and leveling up abilities and passive improvements, as in the role-playing adventure genre. A direct continuation of the story of the original game. The main differences from the first part are a greater emphasis on the plot component and the addition of a more advanced weapon editor with many possible modifications that open up as you progress.

item.title: Torchlight 2
item.description: Game Description Torchlight 2 allows you to play online with a friend, teaming up to play through the story campaign together. Up to six people can play on Pirate for free. The game is available via the Internet online and local connection. The more participants join the adventure, the more enemies there will be on the screen. The plot tells the story of the town of Torchlight. Here, the ancient dragon Ordrak became a source of corruption, but he was defeated by three heroes: the Destroyer, the Alchemist and the Victorious.

item.title: FTL: Faster Than Light
item.description: Game Description FTL: Faster Than Light - this project is a two-dimensional simulator of a space combat ship. The creation and publication of this media product was carried out by the Subset Games studio. The official release took place in the first half of autumn 2012. The gameplay is based on the interaction between the player and the crew of the combat starship. The success of this space tactical strategy will depend on how successful this cooperation is.

item.title: Batman: Arkham City
item.description: Game Description Batman: Arkham City is an action-adventure game with a third-person view, based on one of the most popular heroes of comics, cartoons, films and toys, Batman. This project is an expanded edition of the original game. The media product was developed by Rocksteady Studios. The official release took place in early autumn 2012. The game world is five times larger in area than in the previous Batman: Arkham Asylum.

item.title: Dark Souls Prepare to Die Edition
item.description: Game Description In Dark Souls Prepare to Die Edition you can play online for free as a pirate, team up with a friend, or invade other people’s worlds using an online connection. The role-playing adventure allows you to go into a world where you have to collect Dark Souls, fighting various monsters and incredibly strong enemies. Each enemy poses a serious threat and requires an individual approach. Events take place in the kingdom of Lordan.

item.title: Tower Wars
item.description: Game Description Tower Wars is a crossover of such genres as tower defense and real-time strategy. The gameplay is aimed at confrontations over the Internet online. For free, you can fight with a friend or play online with other players from all over the world. The events of Tower Wars take place in the world of the Middle Ages. Having gotten involved in a military conflict, you need to destroy all enemies in your path.

item.title: Iron Brigade
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Iron Brigade you can play for free online with a friend, controlling combat mechs and fighting each other online online. Game mechanics contain elements of action, strategy and tower defense. The free-to-play feature allows you to team up with your teammates to protect humanity from the alien threat Monovision. Participants take control of mobile combat vehicles, which are equipped with advanced weapons and technology. It is important to think through tactics and develop a strategy to turn the tide of the fight in your favor.

item.title: Death Rally 2012
item.description: Game Description Death Rally 2012 can be played online, competing with a friend or random people online or locally. All online functions are available for free on the pirate site, including the deathmatch mode, where each player fights for himself. The gameplay is an intense competition involving a variety of vehicles and various weapons. You can upgrade vehicles, buy guns and fight bosses in story mode. The possibility of a free online game is aimed at confrontations between people from different parts of the planet.

item.title: Awesomenauts
item.description: Game Description Awesomenauts is a two-dimensional MOBA that allows you to play together with a friend online, fighting for free on a pirate in confrontations both on one device and online online. You can play cooperatively or participate in competitions. The possibility of free online play allows you to take part in dynamic 3 on 3 multiplayer matches. The plot revolves around an interstellar conflict in which robots fight among themselves.

item.title: Orcs Must Die 2
item.description: Game Description Orcs Must Die 2 is a third-person cooperative action game aimed at playing online with a friend. LAN connection and online Internet connection are available. Allows you to go through the campaign together on a pirate, using all network functions for free. There are two main characters - a battle mage and an agile sorceress. Each hero has his own skills and abilities. The protagonists will have to defend their fortress and guard the mines, preventing orcs and other monsters from entering human possessions.

item.title: Iron Front: Liberation 1944
item.description: Game Description Iron Front: Liberation 1944 is a tactical shooter that allows you to play online with a friend and compete with random people from all over the world. Iron Front: Liberation 1944 covers the events of World War II, taking combatants to the Eastern Front. The online game is dedicated to the confrontation between German and Soviet troops. It takes about 10 hours of real time to complete the storyline.

item.title: Stronghold 3
item.description: Game Description Stronghold 3 is a strategy game that allows you to play online, fighting with a friend or other players. All multiplayer modes are included for free on the pirate site. In the third part of the series, an improved system for building castles was introduced, and new types of crafts were added. The network game is designed for co-op and confrontation. A new weather system has been added and additional modes have been included, such as night sieges.

item.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 4: Episode 2
item.description: Game Description Sonic the Hedgehog 4: Episode 2 is a continuation of the game of the same name, which provides the opportunity to play online with a friend for free as a pirate. You can compete locally or online online. The plot once again tells about Dr. Eggman building a base on the Little Planet, where he joins forces with Metal Sonic. The online game offers you to take control of a blue hedgehog or Tails in order to, together with your partner, confront the villain.

item.title: Binary Domain
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Binary Domain you can team up with a friend to play online for free, fighting various enemies online online. The enemies are soldiers, robots, androids, turrets, etc. Online play allows you to take part in dynamic confrontations with different people around the world. Events are transferred to Tokyo of the future, namely in 2080. Dan Marshall and his team go on a secret operation to reprogram the robot society that has begun to infiltrate human life.

item.title: The Walking Dead: Season One
item.description: Game Description The Walking Dead: Season One is an interactive story divided into 6 episodes with elements of a point-n-click adventure and with QTEs in action scenes, telling the story of Lee Everett, a prisoner who was being transported in a police station when the zombie apocalypse began. car to another place of serving his sentence, but due to an attack on the vehicle by the dead, he managed to escape.

item.title: Blades of Time
item.description: Game Description In the pirate game Blades of Time, players can join forces, fighting together against hordes of enemies online online. Together with a friend, you can go through the story campaign with a friend. Free multiplayer mode and Dismal Swamp add-on included. The gameplay is a third-person slasher game. The main character is a girl named Ayumi. The online game allows you to become her partner - a mighty strongman nicknamed Zero.

item.title: Crusader Kings 2
item.description: Game Description The global strategy Crusader Kings 2 can be played online as a pirate, fighting for free with a friend in various multiplayer confrontations. On the Internet online it is possible to participate in versus battles, or to fight in a cooperative against a common enemy. The gameplay is represented by a tactical pause mode. The online game simulates feudal relationships between the countries of medieval Europe and the Middle East.

item.title: The Darkness 2
item.description: Game Description The Darkness 2 is a first-person shooter that can be played either alone or online, teaming up with a friend or players from all over the world. To play online for free on a pirate, you need to select a mode called Vendetta. It includes 2 types of competitions: Co-op and Blacklist. The free multiplayer option includes solo playthrough of missions, but in this case some tasks are blocked.

item.title: Shank 2
item.description: Game Description Shank 2 allows you to fight against computer opponents together with a friend online. You can play this pirate game online with a friend. There is also content for fans of single play. There is a story campaign of 7 missions. Like its predecessor, Shank 2 belongs to the Beat ‘em up and Action genres. The possibility of free online play in this project is designed for two people.

item.title: Insane 2
item.description: Game Description Insane 2 offers you to take part in joint races over the Internet online. On the pirate Insane 2, you can play online with a friend for free or compete with random people from all over the world. Multiplayer includes 9 unique modes, including Capture the Flag, Gate Hunt and Pathfinder. Players can also take part in competitions such as Bonus Hunt, Territory Control, Helicopter Chase and many other competitions.

item.title: LEGO Harry Potter Years 5-7
item.description: Game Description LEGO Harry Potter Years 5-7 - an arcade game with the ability to play for free online with a friend, controlling the characters of the famous film franchise. Multiplayer is available locally and online, offering key scenes from the final three films in the franchise: Order of the Phoenix, Half-Blood Prince and Deathly Hallows. The visual side is made in the style of Lego toys. The main action of Lego Harry Potter takes place in Hogwarts castle.

item.title: Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon
item.description: Game Description Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon is an arcade third-person shooter that allows you to participate in single-player battles and multiplayer battles online over the Internet. Moreover, even on a pirated game it is possible to play online with a friend. The product is made in a sci-fi setting. The possibility of free online play adds replayability to the project. Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon takes place in New Detroit.

item.title: Serious Sam 3 BFE
item.description: Game Description Serious Sam 3 BFE is a first-person shooter that allows you to compete with a friend on a pirate, or play for free online with other players. A LAN connection is available and there is the ability to fight online over the Internet. Cool Sam 3 is presented in a single-player mode, where you have to fight otherworldly evil spirits, controlling a powerful demon slayer with a huge cannon at the ready.

item.title: Saints Row: The Third
item.description: Game Description Saints Row: The Third is a third-person action game in an open world, the plot of which can be completed with a friend using an online Internet connection. All network capabilities of the project are available for free on the pirate site. If you play online with a partner, you will need to explore the city of Stillwater. The Saints became a real brand, and Johnny Gat gained the status of a cupmaster.

item.title: Saints Row: The Third
item.description: Game Description The Third Street Saints are a large and large group in the universe of the game Saints Row: The Third. The third-person shooter with its crazy plots gave the game’s heroes their own brand of sneakers, a carbonated drink and a logo, and now they have to fight the world’s largest crime syndicate, whose people are scattered around the world and do their work in the “shadows”. Since the main characters have long captured Stillwater, the Syndicate demands offerings from them in the form of tribute for the criminal leadership.

item.title: The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim
item.description: Game Description The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim is rightfully considered a legendary game. Even now, many years after its release, it continues to conquer new users who come to it based on recommendations or out of their own interest. In the role of a warrior named Dovahkiin, the gamer will find himself in a huge world full of mysteries, unexpected turns and battles. Here it is not possible to follow the path of a straightforward passage.

item.title: CastleMiner Z
item.description: Game Description CastleMiner Z is an open world project that is great for playing online with a friend as a pirate. Here, players are thrown onto a map made in the Minecraft setting, where all objects, biomes and areas of the territory are made in an identical style. In addition, there are several options for spending time in accordance with one or another mode. Therefore, people can coordinate online online and have some real fun.

item.title: Call Of Duty Modern Warfare 3
item.description: Game Description Call Of Duty Modern Warfare 3 is a continuation of the cult shooter, which offers the opportunity to play online with a friend or compete in online confrontations over the Internet. All network capabilities and functions of the project are available for free on the pirate site. Both online play and a single-player campaign are available, the events of which develop in 2017 during the Third World War.

item.title: Lord of the Rings War in the North
item.description: Game Description Lord of the Rings War in the North is a role-playing game that allows you to go on a journey with other players online online, or a pirate can team up with a friend for free to confront common enemies. Up to three people can play online. The Lord of the Rings: War in the North takes place in the fictional world of Middle-earth. Each takes on the role of one of the franchise’s famous heroes.

item.title: To the Moon
item.description: Game Description To the Moon is a philosophical story about two doctors - Eva Rosalina and Neil Watts from the Sigmund organization. The heroes make a tragic journey through the memories of a dying man. In this way they are trying to fulfill his last will, the essence of which is to let the person live his life again. The dying person remembers the new life that he sees at death before leaving this world.

item.title: Battlefield 3
item.description: Game Description On the pirated version of Battlefield 3 you can play online for free with a friend and take part in numerous online multiplayer competitions with players from all over the world. The possibility of free online play allows 64 participants to fight on one map. Having chosen a fighter of a certain class, you need to fight in one of the available modes. Depending on the match, the victory condition and mechanics change.

item.title: Renegade Ops
item.description: Game Description Renegade Ops is a top-down action game. It has online multiplayer and local co-op. On this pirate game you can play with a friend online. In the story, the heroes are trying to stop Inferno, who wants to dominate the whole world. He erased the face of the Earth from one of the megacities and settled in one of the poor countries. General Bryant sent his soldiers to him to get even with him.

item.title: Dungeon Defenders
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Defenders combines Action with RPG and Tower Defense elements. The title can be played online with a friend on pirate. This version allows you to do this online online. The project is designed for co-op, although it also has a single. The plot tells how young heroes save the fantasy country of Etheria from the forces of an awakened ancient evil. The campaign is divided into missions with different difficulty levels.

item.title: The Cursed Crusade
item.description: Game Description The Cursed Crusade is an adventure with the ability to play online with a friend on a pirate, the events of which take place in 1198. You have to take control of the Templars in order to go together online via the Internet to the Fourth Crusade. Multiplayer allows participants to choose one of two characters: Denz de Bail and the mercenary Esteban Noviembre. The possibility of free online play allows you to go through the story in splitscreen mode.

item.title: RAGE
item.description: Game Description RAGE is a first-person shooter with rear-facing racing elements. In the project, you can run and drive through local post-apocalyptic spaces, either alone or with other users online. It’s also possible to play pirated games with a friend online. There is enough content in both single player and multiplayer. According to the plot, having learned about the approach of an asteroid to Earth, the governments of different countries created bunkers and placed selected representatives of humanity in anabiotic sleep.

item.title: Supreme Commander Forged Alliance
item.description: Game Description Supreme Commander Forged Alliance is a stand-alone add-on to the strategy of the same name, in which you can play online with a friend. For free, players can compete online on the pirate Supreme Commander Forged Alliance. The expansion introduced a new Seraphim faction, including 110 new units. Network play introduces additional modes for cooperative play and multiplayer confrontations. The plot begins two years after the creation of the Black Sun weapon.

item.title: The Binding of Isaac
item.description: Game Description The Binding of Isaac can be played for free online as a pirate with a friend, so that you can go through complex puzzles online together, performing the sacrifice of Isaac. The plot revolves around a young boy, Isaac, whose mother must prove her faith by making a sacrifice to God. Free online play includes co-op exploration of the basement, where you’ll encounter siblings and your own mother.

item.title: Worms Ultimate Mayhem
item.description: Game Description On the pirate version of Worms Ultimate Mayhem all network functions are available for free, allowing you to play online with a friend on the same screen or fight online online with an army of other players. You can either join teams or fight in co-op against a common enemy. Worms: Slaughter offers to take control of an army of well-armed worms, whose goal is to destroy the enemy army.

item.title: Bunch of Heroes
item.description: Game Description Bunch of Heroes is a cooperative action game designed for online co-op playthroughs. The story centers on a team of elite fighters, The Bunch, defending the Earth from an alien invasion. On Pirate, you can play online with a friend or go through the story campaign in single player mode for free. Aliens control an army of zombies. The online game offers you to take control of one of four heroes: Agent Leah, Jared Joe, El Camarada or Captain Smith.

item.title: Rock Of Ages
item.description: Game Description Rock Of Ages not only gives you the opportunity to play online with a friend on a pirate, but also allows you to feel the effect of combining elements of different genres. Gamers will be able to travel through different time periods, encountering different historical figures. The idea is simple - destroy the enemy castle before the enemy himself goes on the offensive. The main weapon is a huge boulder, which must be aimed at enemy buildings.

item.title: Warhammer 40:000 Space Marine Anniversary Edition
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Warhammer 40:000 Space Marine you can play online for free with a friend, going through a rich story campaign together, or compete online online with players from all over the world. Warhammer: Space Marines is a fast-paced third-person shooter. You will play as the Ultramarines, fighting with futuristic guns and a variety of melee weapons. The online game Warhammer 40:000 Space Marine allows two teams of 8 people to fight.

item.title: E.Y.E.: Divine Cybermancy
item.description: Game Description E.Y.E.: Divine Cybermancy offers the opportunity to play online with a friend or team up with up to four people to explore the oppressive cyberpunk world together for free on a pirate ship. Alone or together with partners online, you will need to engage in a battle for resources. Players must confront the powerful Federation. Each participant takes on the role of an agent of the armed secret society Secreta Secretorum.

item.title: Air Conflicts: Secret Wars
item.description: Game Description For free on the pirated version of Air Conflicts: Secret Wars you can play online with a friend, controlling combat aircraft from the First and Second Wars. The gameplay combines arcade and simulator mechanics. Players can compete with each other online online or engage in battles locally by selecting a special splitscreen mode. Multiplayer allows up to four people to team up. Several multiplayer competitions are available, designed for duels or massive air battles.

item.title: LEGO Pirates of the Caribbean: The Video Game
item.description: Game Description LEGO Pirates of the Caribbean: The Video Game offers exciting adventures and the ability to play online with a friend. Players are taken on a journey through all four films, reliving key moments with a twist. Jack Sparrow and his ragtag crew come to life as bricks, each with their own quirks and abilities. You can play pirate for free and enjoy online gaming online. From Port Royal to Davy Jones' Locker, the Caribbean becomes a playground for adventure.

item.title: Terraria
item.description: Game Description Terraria is a two-dimensional adventure that you can play online with a friend, or fight against other participants online online. Multiplayer, single player and co-op are available for free on the pirate site. Gameplay Terraria is a survival simulator, with crafting and platforming. There are generated caves and many other locations to explore. Multiplayer allows you to go on an adventure with up to four people. Mechanics allow you to dig, fight, explore, build and much more.

item.title: Terraria
item.description: Game Description Terraria is a simulator of construction, life, survival, an interesting storyline and everything that could be combined into a game with the Sand Box style. Simple 8-bit graphics take us into a randomly generated world generated by the game itself. The open map is almost endless if you dig deep into the world, but you will be stopped by armies of monsters or underground knights. Terraria is not as simple as it seems.

item.title: The Witcher 2 Assassins of Kings
item.description: Game Description The computer game “The Witcher 2 Assassins of Kings” is an expanded limited edition of the impressive continuation of the 2008 giant of the world of role-playing video games “The Witcher”. The development of this project was carried out by the famous studio CD PROJEKT RED. The announcement came in May 2011. Geralt of Rivia is the greatest of the line of witchers, wielding a sword better than others, almost the only one who can resist the forces of darkness, while being something between an ordinary person and a monster.

item.title: Portal 2
item.description: Game Description Portal 2 is a first-person puzzle game in which you can solve puzzles with a friend using an online Internet connection. You can play Pirate online for free, using devices to create portals in space. With their help, you can instantly move from one place to another. There is a cooperative game, which makes it possible to go through the story campaign together. Events unfold immediately after the end of the previous part.

item.title: Portal 2
item.description: Game Description The first-person puzzle game Portal 2 received an official announcement only in the spring of 2011, after several postponements. This project is a direct continuation of the original part, which received the highest reviews from critics and gamers around the world. The game was developed by the legendary company Valve, which needs no introduction. The game’s plot continues the line begun in the first part of the “Portal” series.

item.title: Dino D-Day
item.description: Game Description Dino D-Day is a multiplayer shooter set in 1942. The gameplay allows you to play online as a pirate with a friend or compete online for free with players around the world. The story begins with Adolf Hitler succeeding in reviving the dinosaurs. He does everything he can to get them to attack Europe. The Nazi army becomes truly invincible. Key features of Dino D-Day: 7 types of dinosaurs: Velociraptor, Dilophosaurus, Desmatosuchus, Stygimolochus, Protoceratops Trigger, Tyrannosaurus Rex and Styracosaurus; 9 human characters; 26 types of weapons; phantasmagoric setting of World War II; multiplayer battles inspired by Team Fortress and Left 4 Dead.

item.title: HOARD
item.description: Game Description HOARD is an extensive addition to Dynamite Roll, allowing you to play for free on a pirate online with a friend or using an online Internet connection to fight with players around the world. 9 new maps, online play, many new items and other content have been introduced. Everyone takes on the role of a dragon. You can send terror to villages, burn castles, collect gold, kidnap princesses, fight knights and colossi, and compete with other dragons.

item.title: Crysis 2 - Maximum Edition
item.description: Game Description Crysis 2 - Maximum Edition is a futuristic first-person shooter that allows you to play online with a friend. Pirates has a free co-op option. It is also possible to compete with each other online on the Internet. Network play allows you to use the Nanosuit’s abilities in battle, be it strength, protection, invisibility, etc. Crysis 2 - Maximum Edition includes the possibility of free online play, contains 4 unique bonuses, a new type of camouflage and weapon coloring.

item.title: LEGO Star Wars 3 - The Clone Wars
item.description: Game Description LEGO Star Wars 3: The Clone Wars allows you to play online for free with a friend on a pirate site online. In this online game, gamers go on an exciting journey through the Star Wars galaxy. This installment of the LEGO Star Wars series introduces new mechanics that allow fans to create, control and explore like never before. Participants will be able to experience over 20 story missions and 40 bonus levels spanning the entire era of the Clone Wars.

item.title: Mafia 2 (Classic)
item.description: Game Description Mafia 2 (Classic) is a continuation of the cult action game in the open world, which players can play online online. You can play online for free with a friend on a pirate ship, exploring the city of Empire Bay together. The gameplay of Mafia 2 (Classic) is represented by the mechanics of a third-person shooter and a car simulator. You can freely move around the city and steal cars.

item.title: Post Apocalyptic Mayhem
item.description: Game Description Post Apocalyptic Mayhem is a survival race that allows you to play online with a friend or compete with random players. There are many multiplayer modes available for free on the pirate site, in which you need to destroy enemies while driving a variety of vehicles equipped with large-caliber guns. The possibility of free online play offers you to choose one of 16 cars and fight in 6 interactive arenas.

item.title: Total War SHOGUN 2
item.description: Game Description Total War SHOGUN 2 combines elements of turn-based strategy and RTS, allowing you to play online as a pirate, fight alone, or compete with a friend on numerous interactive maps. All online content is available for free, including single content and addons. The opportunity to play online online with both friends and players from all over the world is also available. The gameplay of Total War SHOGUN 2 is aimed at large-scale battles, where only the tactics and abilities of the commander are of key importance.

item.title: Homefront
item.description: Game Description Homefront is a first-person shooter in which you can fight with bots offline or with other users online. On this pirate game you can play with a friend online. Full single player available. The story mode offers linear gameplay, familiar to corridor buffoons. Homefront takes place in the near future. According to the scriptwriters, by 2025 the two countries will unite and call themselves the Great Korean Republic, led by Kim Jong-un.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 2 - Retribution
item.description: Game Description The Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 2 - Retribution add-on allows you to play online with a friend, fighting each other on a pirate ship for free. You can compete online or over a local network. The ability to play Warhammer 40,000 for free online allows you to choose one of 6 races with their own unique abilities and characteristics. A single player campaign and an online game aimed at confrontation are presented.

item.title: Magicka
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Magicka you can play online with a friend for free. Internet connection available online or local co-op. The story centers on four mages from a spiritual order facing off against the wizard Grimnir and his army of darkness. However, the greatest threat is posed by Assatura, a powerful demon eager to destroy the entire world of Midgard. The setting is inspired by Norse mythology, contains many references to various game universes and fantasy books, and also contains a huge amount of humor.

item.title: Monday Night Combat
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Monday Night Combat you can play online with a friend, competing for free in various multiplayer modes online online. The gameplay is represented by third-person action with the ability to collect loot, pass various tests, etc. Monday Night Combat is a classic competitive shooter set in a future world called Fanland. A new type of competition is emerging called Crossfire. It is quickly gaining momentum and more and more fighters want to compete for the main prize.

item.title: Swords And Soldiers HD
item.description: Game Description Swords And Soldiers HD allows you to play pirate with a friend online. In addition to online battles on the Internet, there is a single. The title can be classified as a real-time strategy game. The project differs from other representatives of the genre in two features. Firstly, the user cannot directly give orders to his units. Secondly, he observes what is happening from the side. In Swords And Soldiers HD you can fight on the side of the Aztecs, Chinese and Vikings.

item.title: Alien Breed 3: Descent
item.description: Game Description Alien Breed 3: Descent can be played online for free, working with a friend through the story campaign and destroying crowds of bloodthirsty alien monsters. You can play online online or go through the story on one device. The online game Alien Breed 3: Descent invites you to learn the terrible truth about the existence of an extraterrestrial civilization. Aliens are attacking from all sides, so you need to quickly react to situations and make decisions at lightning speed.

item.title: Call of Duty Black Ops
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Call of Duty Black Ops you can play for free online in co-op with a friend or compete online with players from all over the world. Network play is available locally. Multiplayer includes several different team modes. Free online play allows you to team up with up to four players to play through the campaign in co-op. The multiplayer portion of Call of Duty Black Ops includes perks that are divided into three groups.

item.title: Front Mission Evolved
item.description: Game Description Front Mission Evolved can be played online online, fighting with a friend or against other people on a pirate for free. It is possible to play online in co-op or participate in confrontation, controlling massive Wanzers combat robots. They are equipped with advanced technologies and weapons. The ability to play online for free in Front Mission Evolved allows you to complete many tasks together, as well as design your own mecha.

item.title: Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light
item.description: Game Description Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light allows you to go through the story campaign with a friend online or locally. You can even play with a friend online on a pirated platform. One user controls Lara Croft. And the second user is given control of the Mayan warrior Totek. “Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light” does not just include the possibility of free online play in addition to the single player.

item.title: Civilization 5
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Civilization 5 all network modes are available for free, allowing you to compete with other players online online. You can play online with a friend using a local connection. Sid Meier’s Civilization V is a turn-based strategy game where you make moves across a hexagonal map. For the first time in the series, barbarian states appeared. Captured empires are now called satellites. The possibility of free online play allows for remote shooting.

item.title: Sid Meier's Civilization 5
item.description: Game Description Sid Meier’s Civilization V is a strategy game with an RTS style, where we still build a civilization from primitive times to the present. You can choose from 18 strong powers of this world, within which you can add 7 wonders of the world, put in control a leader who has individual characteristics, and also does everything in his own way. The legendary turn-based strategy series introduces us to the sequel, in which a huge number of additional areas have been added.

item.title: Alien Breed 2: Assault
item.description: Game Description Alien Breed 2: Assault is a shooter that you can play online with a friend, together fighting a horde of alien monsters for free on a pirate ship. Over the Internet, online or locally, you can go through the story campaign, jointly exploring the dark rooms of a huge space station. The main character of Alien Breed 2: Assault is an engineer named Conrad. The protagonist has fallen into a deadly trap and now he needs to find a ghostly chance of salvation, confronting a bloodthirsty crowd of strangers.

item.title: R.U.S.E.
item.description: Game Description In R.U.S.E you can play with a friend online for free, fighting as a pirate in all confrontation modes and joining forces online online. Events take place during the Second World War. A special feature of the gameplay is tactics. Alone or using the free online game, you can move your troops around the battlefield, camouflaging them with the help of the environment. Allows you to frighten opponents and take them by surprise.

item.title: Worms Reloaded
item.description: Game Description Worms Reloaded is a turn-based competitive game that you can play as a pirate for free online with a friend, fighting in intense duels over the Internet online or locally. Events take place in space. Worms Reloaded offers both multiplayer and single-player adventures across 35 levels. Added a new Castle mode. There is a map editor that allows you to create your own unique locations. The worms can be customized by wearing different hats and costumes, as well as giving the characters individual voices.

item.title: Nation Red
item.description: Game Description Nation Red is a dynamic action game in which you can play online as a pirate for free, fighting against hordes of zombies with a friend. You can survive with random players online online. You need to fight in huge interactive arenas with mutant zombies. Allows you to engage in close combat with enemies. The number of infected people on the screen can reach 1000 units. At the end of each level there is an intense boss fight.

item.title: Kane and Lynch 2: Dog Days
item.description: Game Description Kane and Lynch 2: Dog Days is a sequel to the cooperative action game, which introduces the opportunity to play online with a friend for free on a pirate site. Online playthrough and single-player campaign are available. The events of Kane and Lynch 2: Dog Days directly continue the previous part. Free co-op play allows teammates to take on the role of one of two heroes. Each character has its own unique character traits.

item.title: Split Second: Velocity
item.description: Game Description Split Second: Velocity offers free online play for fast-paced, explosive races. Pirate players can compete both locally and online online. You can compete in splitscreen mode with a friend. Gameplay Split Second: Velocity is an arcade racing game with action elements. A single player campaign and online play are available, allowing you to compete in co-op or take part in multiplayer races. The plot tells about a murderous and spectacular reality show.

item.title: Splinter Cell: Conviction
item.description: Game Description Splinter Cell: Conviction introduces the ability to play online online, going through the story campaign together with a friend. You can play the pirate game online for free, or go through the levels alone. The multiplayer and single-player campaign introduce many new abilities, such as Mark and Execute. Sam Fisher can mark enemies on the map and then kill them. The number of marks depends on the weapon. The maximum number of marks can be set using FN Five-seveN.

item.title: Serious Sam HD: The Second Encounter
item.description: Game Description The pirated version of Serious Sam HD: The Second Encounter allows you to play online for free, teaming up with a friend or random participants from all over the world. You can play online, compete in multiplayer, or go through the story campaign alone. Cool Sam: Second Coming differs from the previous installment as there are new weapons such as a chainsaw, flamethrower, sniper rifle and a “serious bomb”.

item.title: Lead and Gold
item.description: Game Description Due to the fact that Lead and Gold is a team project, it can be played online with a friend on pirate. Battles take place here in a 4v4 format, where each user chooses a character of a certain class. The heroes' skills can be combined to speed up the process of achieving the goal. Depending on the initial conditions of the game mode (there are 6 in total), you have to act differently each time, adapting to the conditions of the map and the current tasks.

item.title: Mount and Blade Warband
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Mount and Blade Warband you can play online with random players, fight each other on the pirate for free, unite in coalitions, explore the open world with a friend and much more. On the online pirate site you will need to join the fight for the throne of Calradia. The possibility of free online play brings together up to 64 participants on one map, allowing you to organize a massive massacre or fight in wall-to-wall mode.

item.title: Mount and Blade: Warband
item.description: Game Description Mount & Blade: Warband is a standalone add-on that brings many improvements and innovations to the game. New textures, object and character models, as well as sophisticated visualization settings. Change FSAA anti-aliasing, tone mapping and other effects in the settings. Modernized animations, improved combat system and the spirit of the heroes. People will flee if they are in imminent danger or, conversely, fight to the last if their morality is high.

item.title: Batman: Arkham Asylum Game of the Year Edition
item.description: Game Description In Batman: Arkham Asylum the protagonist will still have to fight the Scarecrow, capture territories that belonged to the Joker or other villains, and in return we will be treated to 4 new maps: Crime Alley, Scarecrow’s Nightmare, Night Stalker and Complete Madness. The founder of the legendary series, Batman: Arkham Asylum is a stealth action game with a third-person view and an open world. In the role of the Dark Knight of Gotham, the gamer can freely explore the Arkham psychiatric hospital and the island on which it is located, fight enemies using a convenient and spectacular combat system, and an arsenal of all kinds of gadgets.

item.title: Just Cause 2
item.description: Game Description Just Cause 2 takes users into a familiar universe, where now, in addition to single-player gameplay, it is now possible to play online with a friend on a pirate. Here, unlike the first part of the series, many innovations have been added, which are especially noticeable with the participation of several users. As before, the main location is the fictional island state of Panau. Only now, when it is possible to play online on the Internet, the level of chaos here is noticeably increasing, and this can be felt from the first minutes of entering the server.

item.title: Battlefield: Bad Company 2
item.description: Game Description Battlefield: Bad Company 2 is a multiplayer shooter that allows you to play for free on a pirate online with a friend, or gives you the opportunity to compete in intense battles over the Internet online or locally. The network game is represented by such modes as Capture, Assault, Skirmish and Realism. Depending on the choice of mode, the victory conditions and gameplay mechanics change. VIP, Special Forces, Upgrade Unlock, Onslaught, Vietnam and other multiplayer matches are available as additional competitions.

item.title: Supreme Commander 2
item.description: Game Description In Supreme Commander 2 you can participate in battles with a friend or team up on a pirate in order to play together online, fighting a common enemy. The network game is available for free and allows you to take part in large-scale wars online on the Internet. In single player or multiplayer, the player begins the match with the Armored Command Center - a huge and powerful unit that can erect buildings and personally fight enemies.

item.title: Total War NAPOLEON Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description Total War NAPOLEON Definitive Edition gives you the opportunity to play with a friend on a pirate. By joining forces to play online on the Internet, or by participating in military battles with artificial intelligence, you can become a witness to many historical battles. Allows you to play online with players from all over the world. Total War NAPOLEON Definitive Edition includes all previously released content, added the ability to play online for free, etc.

item.title: LEGO Indiana Jones 2: The Adventure Continues
item.description: Game Description LEGO Indiana Jones 2: The Adventure Continues is an action-adventure based on the film Indiana Jones Kingdom of the Crystal Skull with the ability to play online with a friend, exploring bright locations for free as a pirate, solving puzzles and going through famous moments from the cult film. You can play through the campaign on Pirate Online, or the online game LEGO Indiana Jones 2: The Adventure Continues allows friends to create their own maps that can be shared with the world.

item.title: Aliens vs Predator
item.description: Game Description Aliens vs Predator is a first-person shooter in which you can play online with a friend, competing for free on a pirate in different confrontation modes. Online co-op play is available. The possibility of free online play offers you to fight for one of three factions: Alien, Predator or Human. Each side has its own unique characteristics that affect the gameplay mechanics. The atmosphere changes depending on which side you choose.

item.title: Stalker Call of Pripyat
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Pripyat is a first-person shooter with RPG elements that you can play online with a friend, exploring the Exclusion Zone together on a pirate. A co-op mode is available for free, allowing you to play online online. Allows you to participate in PvP competitions, tracking down other stalkers and taking their loot. The events of the story campaign take place immediately after Strelok destroyed the O-Consciousness project.

item.title: Bioshock 2
item.description: Game Description The pirated version of Bioshock 2 offers the opportunity to play online for free with a friend, competing in a variety of online confrontation modes. By defeating opponents, you earn experience points, which are spent on new weapons and upgrades, such as plasmids, tonics, combinations and abilities. The possibility of free online play returns participants to the underwater world of the city of Rapture. At the beginning, you are given a choice of 8 characters.

item.title: Company of Heroes Eastern Front
item.description: Game Description Company of Heroes Eastern Front, although it is only an addition to the main part, at the same time gives the opportunity to play online with a friend on a pirate. This project invites you to take part in new campaigns showing different periods of the Second World War. Here, the developers introduced the Soviet faction, adding a number of operations with its participation. This involves the use of unique infantry and equipment units that are exclusive to that side.

item.title: Serious Sam HD: The First Encounter
item.description: Game Description Serious Sam HD: The First Encounter introduces the ability to play with a friend online, fighting online with a huge number of monsters. You can go through the campaign for free on a pirate with a partner or compete on special version maps. The re-release of Cool Sam HD: First Blood includes improved effects, textures, bonus content, etc. The protagonist of the adventure, Sam Stone, fights against powerful demons and monsters from another dimension.

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2
item.description: Game Description Left 4 Dead 2 is a first-person shooter that allows you to play for free as a pirate online with a friend or team up with up to 4 people using an online Internet connection. The story centers on Survivors fighting a horde of Infected. 7 unique campaigns are presented: Extinct Center, Passage, Gloomy Carnival, Swamp Fever, Terrible Rain, Parish and Cold Stream. They consist of several levels. The multiplayer game allows four survivors to reach safe rooms, passing through numerous obstacles and hordes of zombies.

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2
item.description: Game Description In Left 4 Dead 2 we have a choice between 4 characters. The coach is a massive African American; Nick is an avid gambler, a trickster and a master of theft; Rochelle is a black 29-year-old Depeche Mode fan and journalist; Ellis is a racing fan and car enthusiast. The cooperative first-person shooter captivated many players for several years, providing ample ground for exterminating zombies in 5 game campaigns, which take place in swamps, cities, caves and closed locations.

item.title: LEGO Star Wars - The Complete Saga
item.description: Game Description LEGO Star Wars - The Complete Saga is the legendary LEGO game based on the Star Wars universe. The player is given a unique opportunity to become a participant in the events of his favorite film epic, feel all the experiences of the heroes and choose the Dark or Light Side. All LEGO games have cartoon graphics, which is beneficial and creates the right atmosphere. The gameplay cannot be called varied, but it does not get boring.

item.title: LEGO Star Wars: The Complete Saga
item.description: Game Description LEGO Star Wars: The Complete Saga allows you to play online with a friend on a pirate for free. Immerse yourself in an exciting adventure and experience all six Star Wars films in one game. The online multiplayer game adds new characters, levels and features, bringing the iconic saga to life like never before. Build and fight in a galaxy far, far away on your computer. Get ready to unleash the Force like never before with enhanced Force capabilities!

item.title: Call Of Duty Modern Warfare 2
item.description: Game Description On the pirated version of Call Of Duty Modern Warfare 2 you can play online for free with a friend. There is both local co-op, and various competitive modes are available online online, allowing you to demonstrate your skill and superiority. The single-player campaign will take players to Russia, Kazakhstan, Brazil, Afghanistan and the USA. The online game consists of classic competitive modes. Added additional matches: 3rd Person Team Deathmatch, 3rd Person Cagematch, Demolition, Capture the Flag and Mosh Pit.

item.title: Shattered Horizon
item.description: Game Description On the pirate game Shattered Horizon you can play online for free with a friend, fighting together in the vastness of outer space or participating in confrontations over the Internet online. The Shattered Horizon is represented by first-person shooter mechanics. Single player campaign and online play available. A special feature of the gameplay is that events develop in conditions of zero gravity. Maps are represented by orbital infrastructures, between which you need to move.

item.title: Stronghold Legends
item.description: Game Description Stronghold Legends is a real-time strategy game that you can play online for free as a pirate with a friend. Battles take place locally or online online. The online game allows you to take control of three factions: King Arthur - the forces of good, Dietrich of Berne - the cold and Vlad Dracula - the forces of darkness. There have been huge changes compared to the second part.

item.title: Operation Flashpoint: Dragon Rising
item.description: Game Description Operation Flashpoint: Dragon Rising is a tactical shooter that you can play online for free as a pirate with a friend. You can compete online online in various version modes and participate in cooperative matches. Events develop in the fictional territories of the Far East - on the island of Skira. The continent is rich in oil, so three parties to the conflict are entering the race for resources: Russia, the United States and China.

item.title: Order of War
item.description: Game Description Order of War is a strategy set during the Second World War. On the pirate Order of War, you can play online with a friend, participating for free in all multiplayer modes. To fight each other, you will need to connect online via the Internet. Multiplayer allows you to control squadrons of bombers, use infantry mortars, call in heavy artillery, etc. The possibility of free online play allows you to participate in cooperative matches, as well as go through the challenge mode, where you need to hold back the onslaught of a huge number of enemies.

item.title: Majesty 2
item.description: Game Description Majesty 2 may please those who like to fight online or locally over the Internet. You can play Pirate with a friend online. Multiplayer is designed for a maximum of 4 users. This is a strategy with indirect controls. The project has an alternative name – Majesty 2: The Fantasy Kingdom Sim. It is impossible to highlight units with a frame and give them clear orders. The user can only give general instructions to his wards.

item.title: Age Of Empires 3
item.description: Game Description In Age Of Empires 3 you can compete online online with players from all over the world or play online with a friend, competing for free on pirates in versus matches. Co-op mode available and cross-platform supported. New additions include two modes: Historical Battles and Art of War. The single player campaign and online play are still available. Age of Empires 3 allows you to take control of 8 major powers, as well as 16 additional ones, including the Swedes and Incas.

item.title: Need for Speed: Shift
item.description: Game Description In Need for Speed: Shift you can compete with a friend online, taking part in multiplayer races for free on a pirate. Competitions are available online or locally. Not only is there a possibility of free online play, but also a classic career mode. Racers in NFS Shift go through various types of competitions and participate in special missions. For example, you may need to overtake a specific car or perform another special action.

item.title: Red Faction: Guerrilla
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Red Faction: Guerrilla it is possible to play online with a friend, fighting on the pirate for free in versus mode. You can play co-op online over the Internet. Red Faction: Partizan is a hair-raising first-person shooter. This is the third part of the series of the same name. The plot directly continues the events of the first part. The action takes place 50 years after the end of the original game.

item.title: Resident Evil 5: Gold Edition
item.description: Game Description Resident Evil 5: Gold Edition introduces the opportunity to play pirate online for free with a friend, going through the story campaign together online. You can play alone. In this case, artificial intelligence takes on the role of a partner. Free online play allows you to play through the Lost In Nightmares and Desperate Escape add-ons included in the Gold Edition together. Events move to Africa. The protagonists hunt for Albert Wesker and try to find out the truth about the deadly Ouroboros virus, which turns people into terrible monsters.

item.title: Dawn Of Magic 2
item.description: Game Description On the pirated version of Dawn of Magic 2 you can play online with a friend for free, going through the story campaign together online. The plot directly continues the original. Players will have to fight phantasmagorical creatures and enter into an unequal battle with the immortal Modo. The balance of power has been disrupted and the Legions of Shadows are eager to take over the world of the living.

item.title: Dusk-12 (Territory of Darkness)
item.description: Game Description Dusk-12 takes users to an epidemic-ridden town with a post-Soviet flavor, located somewhere in the Russian outback. This first-person shooter can be played either alone or online with a friend (including on a pirate). Multiplayer is only available online online. It offers old school gameplay. The project has not only the possibility of free online play, but also two single-player campaigns. They let you play as two characters. Each has its own storyline.

item.title: Wolfenstein (2009)
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Wolfenstein (2009) you can play with a friend on the pirate for free online, fighting with one of three classes. On the Internet online you can play as one of three classes: soldier, engineer or medic. All heroes have their own unique abilities. For example, soldiers use explosives and heavy weapons, medics heal allies, and engineers construct buildings. The network game is aimed at dueling confrontations and battles between teams.

item.title: Trine Enchanted Edition
item.description: Game Description Trine Enchanted Edition is an adventure platformer with puzzle elements that allows you to play online with a friend on a pirate for free. Each player can take control of one of three heroes. The network game is designed for 3 participants. Each character has unique abilities. You need to combine skills and help your teammates to overcome obstacles and solve spatial puzzles. Trine’s gameplay is entirely based on interaction with objects and physics.

item.title: Minecraft
item.description: Game Description Minecraft is a cubic sandbox aimed at playing for free online with a friend. On the pirate site, you can organize online competitions on the Internet or join forces to build your own kingdom together. Free online play in Minecraft allows you to communicate with your teammates as you explore a procedurally generated world together. Network play is available locally or in split-screen mode. The gameplay is represented by three modes: survival, hardcore and creativity.

item.title: Killing Floor
item.description: Game Description Killing Floor 2 is a cooperative shooter that offers the opportunity to play online as a pirate with a friend, competing for free in various confrontation modes or participating in cooperative matches online online. The online game is divided into two components: Survival and Versus. All competitions offer matches with unique mechanics. Also available in Killing Floor 2 are various features for all competitions and various modifiers. In survival mode, six people find themselves in one huge arena, where they must destroy many ordinary enemies and a powerful boss.

item.title: Plants vs. Zombies GOTY Edition
item.description: Game Description Plants vs. Zombies became the game of the year, winning in many categories. The developers invite us to once again plunge into battles in a small location in order to free ourselves from the shackles of various zombies, hold back all the ardor of the monsters and save the city by using the latest technologies in the agricultural industry. Among the primary weapons in strategy, we have a pea shooter, a cherry bomb and sunflowers, which we use to earn money to purchase new strategic weapons.

item.title: Company of heroes Tales of Valor
item.description: Game Description Company of heroes Tales of Valor is an addition to the original game and still allows you to play online with a friend on a pirate. Here, users will have the opportunity to try out new campaigns with more features and challenges. Innovations include 3 new campaigns, 8 units and more detailed infantry management. Now, squads of soldiers are more dependent on supply points. In addition, the game now has a division into day and night, which also affects the tempo of the battle.

item.title: Total War EMPIRE Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description Total War EMPIRE Definitive Edition allows you to play as a pirate online, fighting with players around the world, or participating in battles with a friend. The game is available online and has a full story mode. Total War EMPIRE Definitive Edition includes all special and additional content, added online play, as well as free updates. The gameplay is a mixture of RTS and TBS. With the help of a global map, government is governed.

item.title: Saints Row 2
item.description: Game Description Saints Row 2 is an open world action game that players can play together online on a pirate for free. On the Internet online you can not only compete, but also go through the story campaign with a friend. The main difference from the GTA series is that at the beginning everyone can customize their hero themselves, choosing gender, race, appearance and physique. During the game you can change the appearance of the character.

item.title: Left 4 Dead
item.description: Game Description Left 4 Dead is a multiplayer zombie shooter that allows you to play pirate games online with a friend, teaming up to four people online for free. The survivors fight against the horde of the Infected. Several campaigns are presented, consisting of several levels. The main task is to get to the evacuation zone. Between levels you need to barricade yourself in shelters to replenish your health and ammo.

item.title: Left 4 Dead 1
item.description: Game Description The first part of Left 4 Dead has 6 campaigns, several levels in each. The history and chronology of the chapters are interconnected, which will prevent the gamer from getting confused in the plot. At the beginning of each area, characters will appear at a checkpoint, where they can pick up weapons and ammunition and set off on their further journey. The United States of America has been gripped by an unknown virus that turns people into terrible monsters with bouts of aggression and rage.

item.title: Command and Conquer: Red Alert 3
item.description: Game Description Command and Conquer: Red Alert 3 introduces the opportunity to play online as a pirate with a friend, completing a joint story campaign for free. The gameplay is a real-time strategy game set during the Cold War. You can complete the campaign online online. In the case of a single playthrough, a computer partner is given as an ally. Network play allows you to jointly extract resources, build a base, train troops, develop technologies and destroy the enemy army.

item.title: Far Cry 2
item.description: Game Description On the pirate Far Cry 2 you can play online for free with a friend, fighting intense battles online online, or completing missions together. The gameplay is presented in an open world, allowing naraniki to go to any point in the location. The environment is distinguished by its interactivity. allowing you to interact with wildlife. You can board the transport at any time. Companions can use the free-to-play feature to not only take part in various online modes, but also complete story missions together.

item.title: Brothers in Arms Hells Highway
item.description: Game Description Brothers in Arms Hells Highway is a tactical shooter with the ability to play online online, controlling a soldier of the 101st Airborne Division. On Pirate you can play online for free with a friend, participating in various competitive modes. Brothers in Arms: Hell’s Highway takes you back to World War II. The online game also offers the opportunity to go through the battle known in history as the Dutch Operation together.

item.title: LEGO Batman: The Video Game
item.description: Game Description LEGO Batman: The Videogame offers a unique opportunity to play online and with a friend. This is an online game that allows you to enjoy the adventures of Gotham City for free and pirated. Enter an exciting world where you can fight online against the villains who have escaped from Arkham Asylum and, together with Batman and Robin, restore order in the city. Don’t miss your chance to immerse yourself in a quirky, action-packed adventure crafted from classic LEGO bricks and iconic DC Comics imagery, accessible to players of all ages.

item.title: Crysis Wars
item.description: Game Description Crysis Wars is a multiplayer spin-off of the original shooter Crisis. You can play online with a friend on pirate and compete for free in numerous online championships. The gameplay repeats the basic mechanics of the action game and retains all the capabilities of the suit, which participants can use for tactical purposes: become temporarily invulnerable, invisible, fast, etc. The main emphasis in Crysis Wars is on the possibility of free online play.

item.title: Stalker Clear Sky
item.description: Game Description In Stalker Clear Sky you can play online with a friend using the cooperative mode, or go through the pirate campaign alone. Co-op play is available online online. STALKER: Clear Sky includes free improvements and additions that make the prequel Shadow of Chernobyl more diverse and balanced. Multiplayer allows you to go through the entire story campaign together. New territories were introduced: Red Forest, Limansk, Swamps, Abandoned Hospital and many others.

item.title: FlatOut: Ultimate Carnage
item.description: Game Description FlatOut: Ultimate Carnage is an arcade race for survival that allows you to play for free on a pirate online with a friend, participating in crazy races with total destruction of both the car and the environment. Network play is available locally and online online. The project acts as an expanded port of the second part, adding several new modes, such as carnage and time trial. Free online play allows you to take control of four new pilots: Lewis Durand, Lei Bing, Jill Richards and Curtis Wolfe.

item.title: Rainbow Six Vegas 2
item.description: Game Description Rainbow Six Vegas 2 has the ability to play online, competing with a friend or random participants online online. For free on Pirate, you can participate in versus modes or play as a team, performing in co-op against other participants. The events of the second part act as both a sequel and a prequel to the original shooter. Three game modes are available: single player campaign, online play and co-op.

item.title: Sledgehammer
item.description: Game Description Sledgehammer is literally a festival of destruction and speed that you can experience with a friend on a pirate. With the ability to play online, the user does not have to limit himself to single-player mode, because now you can destroy real opponents, demonstrating your superiority. Rounds of online battles take place on different routes, which have their own terrain features, scales and ways to take the enemy by surprise.

item.title: Obscure 2
item.description: Game Description Obscure 2 continues the plot of the events of the first part and, as before, allows you to play through the campaign with a friend on a pirate.
